loans.name: Chenda's Group

texts.en:
Chenda is living in Battambang province, and she is aged 48 years and the mother of two dependent children. She is a paid worker and cassava farmer for ten years. 

Now she is leading a group of four to take a loan via VisionFund, Kiva’s partner to buy seeds, fertilizer and pay for plowing fees. She hopes to improve her family’s standard of living through this loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and pay for plowing fees, to improve the standard of living of her family

loans.name: Thoeun's Group

texts.en:
Thoeun’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Thoeun makes a living cultivating rice to support his family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.Thoeun

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water at home for their familes.

loans.name: Kim's Group

texts.en:
Kim’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Kim makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water at home for their familes.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water at home for their families.

Sok’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Sok makes a living cultivating rice to support his family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water at home for their families.

Sarat’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Sarat makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a seller to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water at home for their familes.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water at home for their familes.

loans.name: Sokhoeurn's Group

texts.en:
Sokhoeurn is living in Battambang province, and she is age 56 years and the mother of a dependent child. She is a paid worker and cassava farmer for twenty years and these businesses earn her about 35,000KHR per day to support her family. 

Now she is leading a group of three to take a Kiva loan via VisionFund, Kiva’s partner to buy seeds, fertilizer and pay for plowing fees. She hopes to improve her family’s standard of living through this loan and ability to renovate her old house.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and pay for plowing fees to improve the standard of living for her family

loans.name: Yan's Group

texts.en:
Yan’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Yan makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water at home for their families.

loans.name: Las Amigas De Callamarca Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS AMIGAS DE CALAMARCA” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Copacabana, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Lidia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de leche y venta de queso.
El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Lidia es integrante, ella indica que ingreso a Pro Mujer por la invitación de una asesora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de leche; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio hace varios años y lo aprendió de sus padres. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para comprar forraje por mayor para su ganado, este alimento lo adquirirá de las vendedoras de su comunidad  ya que le ayudará a su ganado en la producción de leche para posteriormente comercializarlo.
Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación que brinda la institución.
texts.en:
The community association  "Las Amigas de Calamarca" will begin its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the regional office of Copacabana.   It is formed by 9 members and is led by a board of directors, where Lidia is the president.  The business of the community association members are varied, but include milk and cheese sales.  

The loan will be taken to benefit small businesses where Lidia is a member.  She cited that she joined ProMujer at the invitation of an adviser.  Currently she has a business selling milk.  It is worth noting that she began this business many years ago and learned it form her parents.  

The loan she will currently take is to buy wholesale fodder for her cattle.  She will obtain the nutrients from the vendors in her community, as it will help her cattle later in the production of milk for commercialization.   

This work allows her to generate the resources to help her family economically, as she lives in a domestic partnership and has one child.   

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the trainings that the institution provides.

loans.use: to buy wholesale fodder

loans.name: Mavlyda

texts.ru: Мавлюда, 53 года, замужем, мать 4 детей. Образование у нее среднее, с 1977 года занимается сельским хозяйством. По характеру Мавлюда очень трудолюбивая и отзывчивая женщина. В хозяйстве есть 18 бычков для откорма и продажи. Ее доход семьи составляет около 20,000 (KGS) в месяц. Мавлюда решила и дальше развивать свою деятельность. Для этого она обратилась в Банк «Бай - Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительного количества бычков. На прибыль от кредита Мавлюда планирует отремонтировать дом и построить баню.
texts.en: Mavlyda, 53, is married and has four children. She has a high school diploma and has been making her living from agriculture since 1977. Mavlyda is very hardworking and kind-hearted. She has eighteen bull-calves for fattening up and resale. Her family’s monthly income is about 20,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS). Mavlyda decided to expand her business further. She is requesting a loan of 150,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum bank to buy additional bull calves for fattening up and resale. Thanks to this, she will be able to renovate her home and build a sauna.

loans.use: to buy additional bull calves for fattening up and resale

loans.name: Teresa Esmeralda

texts.es:
Teresa, de 43 años de edad, solo estudio hasta sexto grado, está casada y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, todos  sus hijos viven en su casa y asisten a al escuela, pero también trabajan en la agricultura. 

Teresa, se dedica a la siembra de yuca y maíz desde hace10 años, todo lo aprendió desde pequeña, la parcela donde siembra está cerca de su casa y toda su familia se involucra en el trabajo.

Teresa, necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícola, ya que no tienen los recursos suficientes para cubrir esa necesidad. 

Teresa, siempre ha soñado con cultivar otro tipo de verduras que sea más rentable, para mantener a su numerosa familia.
texts.en:
Teresa, 43 years old, only went to school up to the sixth grade. She is married and her husband works in agriculture. All of their children live in their house and go to school, but they also work in agriculture.

Teresa has worked growing yucca and corn for the past 10 years. She learned everything when she was young. The plot of land that she plants is near her house and all of her family is involved in the work.

Teresa needs the loan to purchase agricultural supplies since they don't have the resources necessary to cover this need. 

Teresa has always dreamed of growing another kind of vegetable which is more profitable to maintain her large family.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Jose Cruz

texts.es:
José, de 47 años de edad, solo estudio hasta sexto grado, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, sus hijos todavía viven en su casa.

José, se dedica a la agricultura y un poco a la ganadería, se ha dedicado a esta actividad desde hace 15 años, también trabaja como jornalero cuando lo buscan, la parcela donde trabaja está a 15 minutos de su casa, en la siembra y la crianza del ganado se involucra toda la familia. 

José, necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como abono, pesticidas y semilla para sembrar maíz.

José, siempre ha soñado con construir su casa de bloque, porque donde vive es de adobe.
texts.en:
José, 47 years old, only went to school up to the sixth grade. He is married and his wife takes care of the domestic tasks. His children still live at home.

José works in agriculture and a little in animal husbandry, he has worked in this field for 15 years. He also works as a day laborer when they seek him out. The land where he works is 15 minutes from his house. The whole family is involved in the crops and raising the cattle. 

José needs the loan to purchase agricultural supplies such as manure, pesticide, and seeds to plant corn.

José has always dreamed of building a house of concrete blocks, because where he lives is made of adobe.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies such as manure, pesticide, and seeds to plant corn.

loans.name: Turgunbu

texts.ru: Тургунбу, 58 лет, замужем. У нее среднее образование, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи, вместе с супругом занимается животноводством, стартовав 25 лет назад с суммы 5,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду, Тургунбу на сегодняшний день имеет 6 коров, 20 овец, 15 коз. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Тургунбу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса и покупку мебели для дома.
texts.en: Turgunbu is a 58-year-old married woman. She has a high school diploma. Her family’s additional source of income is livestock breeding. She started out twenty-five years ago with a sum of 5,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS). Through her hard work, Turgunbu now owns six cows, twenty sheep and fifteen goats. Hoping to expand her business, she is requesting a loan of 150,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum bank to buy additional livestock. She plans to invest the profit in expanding her business even further as well as buying furniture for her home.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Fander Eliud

texts.es:
Fander es un comerciante de 38 años de edad, tiene un negocio de salsamentaría donde da 3 empleos, Fander no es un jefe cualquiera, él se pone en los zapatos de trabajar, realiza domicilios, carga paquetes, vende, trabaja dos horas más que ellos, una persona comprometida en su causa.

Es una persona admirada y reconocida en el barrio no solo por su compromiso con su negocio, sino por su amabilidad, cordialidad y su responsabilidad. 

Labora por mejorar sus condiciones de vida, para darle a su esposa una buena vida, generar empleo es su mayor gratitud y alegría, crecer es su compromiso y tú puedas ayudarlo, colaborando con un préstamo para invertirlo en productos como refrescos, cervezas, granos, abarrotes y surtido de productos de aseo doméstico.
texts.en:
Fander is a 38-year-old businessman. He has a grocery store business where he has 3 employees. Fander is not an ordinary boss. He puts on the work shoes, makes deliveries, carries packages, sells, works two hours more than them; a person very committed to his cause.

He is an admired and well-known person in his neighborhood, not only for his commitment to his business, but also for his friendliness, warmth, and his responsibility.

He works to improve his living conditions, to give his wife a good life. To generate jobs is his biggest source of gratitude and happiness, to grow is his commitment and you can help him, supporting him with a loan to invest in products like soft drinks, beer, grains, groceries and an assortment of household cleaning supplies.

loans.use: to purchase an assortments of soft drinks, beer, grains, groceries and an assortment of household cleaning products.

loans.name: Thuok's Group

texts.en: Thuok’s group lives in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Thuok makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help the two group members to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses, as well as save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: San Francisco Group

texts.es:
Veronica es una mujer de 40 años de edad, casada, tiene 3 hijos de 2, 13 y 15 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos por catálogo.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, optimista, paciente, amable, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona de ‘la mutualista’ un lugar céntrico caracterizado por el cambódromo con capacidad para 30mil personas y mil metros de largo, dónde se realiza; el corso de carnavales, desfiles y otras actividades culturales. De clima cálido sub tropical con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 21-35 grados centígrados.
Verónica es de tez morena, ojos pardos, estatura mediana, cabello negro largo lo usa amarrado, complexión física mediana, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza (la tercera de la izquierda, viste pantalón gris y polera floreada). Su vida la comparte con su pareja que trabaja como transportista y con sus hijos; los mayores estudian en la escuela y el menor aún no se encuentra en edad escolar. Viven en un cuarto alquilado construido de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Sus ganas de superación la llevaron a liderar una banca de personas con negocios como; cerrajería, tejido de mantas, producción de queso, venta de pescado, panadería, venta de fideo y venta de pollo, para solicitar un préstamo y mejorar sus actividades. Su negocio es la venta de cosméticos por catálogo de forma ambulante. Comienza el día y ella se prepara para sus visitas diarias, revisa su agenda y prepara su maletín lleno de muestras, revistas, obsequios, etc., material necesario para captar clientes y fidelizar los que ya tiene. Sus destinos son diferentes cada día y las rutas largas y calurosas, “el estímulo que recibo de mis hijos, me da la fuerza para cumplir mis metas y objetivos de ventas y de vida…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con clientes constantes, la desventaja son las grandes distancias que debe recorrer y la falta de capital para la compra de mercadería. Su sueño es abrir una tienda distribuidora de cosméticos, ella desea ampliar su negocio mediante la inversión en la compra de un stock de cosméticos por mayor para atraer nuevos clientes y mejorar sus ingresos para el bien de sus hijos. Esta es la segunda secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 3 años que se dedica a esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Veronica solicita un préstamo para la compra de cosméticos por mayor para atraer nuevos clientes, mejorar sus ingresos y pagar los gastos de sus 3 hijos.
texts.en:
Veronica is a 40-year-old woman, married and with three children aged 2, 13 and 15. Her business is selling catalogue cosmetics. She is a good mother, entrepreneurial, optimistic, patient, friendly, responsible and hardworking. She operates her business in the 'La Mutualista' district, a central location characterised by its 30,000 capacity event venue measuring 1,000 metres, where the carnival parades and other cultural activities take place. It has a warm, sub-tropical climate with daytime temperatures ranging from 21°C to 35°C. 

Veronica is of average height and medium build. She has dark skin, brown eyes and long black hair that she ties back. Her mother tongue, which she speaks with her family, is Guaraní, and she speaks Spanish outside the home and in her business. In the photo, she is the third from the left, wearing grey trousers and a top with a flower pattern.

She shares her life with her husband, who works in transport, and her children. The older children are at school but the youngest hasn't yet reached school age. They live in rented accommodation, built with bricks and cement and with a corrugated iron roof. It has drinking water, electricity and sewerage. Driven by her desire for self-improvement, she leads a group of people who are in business, for example, as locksmiths, blanket weavers, cheese manufacturers, fish sellers, bakers, chicken vendors and noodle sellers, to request a loan and improve their businesses. Veronica works as a travelling salesperson, selling catalogue cosmetics.

The day begins and she prepares for her daily visits, checks her diary and gets her bag ready. It is full of samples, magazines, free gifts, etc. - the material she needs to gain new customers and keep the ones she already has. She goes to a different place each day and the routes she takes are long in the heat. "The motivation that I get from my children gives me the strength to achieve my life goals and sales targets..." she says. The advantage of her business is that she can count on regular customers. The disadvantages are the large distances she has to cover and the lack of capital to buy merchandise. Her dream is to open a cosmetics distribution shop and she would like to expand her business by investing in wholesale cosmetics stock in order to attract new customers and increase her income for the good of her children.

This is her second round of loans with the institution in the three years she has been involved in this business. This is why Veronica is requesting a loan to buy wholesale cosmetics in order to attract new customers, increase her income and pay the bills to support her three children.

loans.use: to buy wholesale cosmetics in order to attract new customers, increase her income and pay the bills to support her three children.

loans.name: Aichurok

texts.ru: Айчурок успешно погасила свой кредит, она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве есть 3 коровы, 10 овец. Ее ежемесячный доход составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). Айчурок хочет и дальше развивать свой бизнес, поэтому она вновь обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 45,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы от кредита Айчурок планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства.
texts.en: Aichurok has successfully paid back her loan and is grateful to Kiva and all those who helped her to fund her business. She now owns three cows and ten sheep. Her monthly income is 10,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS). Aichurok aspires to expand her business further and is requesting a loan of 45,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum bank in order to buy additional livestock. She plans to invest the profits from the loan in increasing her herd.

loans.use: to buy some livestock in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Edid Del Carmen

texts.es:
Edid una mujer de admirar, una persona con coraje, furia, que no tiene ningún problema en realizar un trabajo de hombre a pesar de su edad, ella vendera pescados, inicialmente pensaba cargar dos cubetas muy pesadas y caminando por los terrenos destapados de tierra alta donde hace un calor sofocante, gritando “pescado, pescado” todo porque sabe que gracias a su negocio en su casa podrán disfrutar de un alimento.
Ella vive junto con su marido con quien vive en un humilde hogar hecho de madera, pero el propósito a futuro es construir un hogar hecho en material (concreto)
Edid quiere solicitar un préstamo para iniciar formalmente su negocio de venta de pescado, comprara pescado, cubetas y una carretilla.
Tu préstamo puede facilitar el trabajo de una mujer de 59 años de edad que solo quiere una mejor calidad de vida para ella y su esposo.
texts.en:
Edid is a woman to admire, a woman with courage and force, who has no problem doing a man's job, despite her age. She will sell fish. Initially she was thinking of carrying to very heavy basins, and walking through the open land of the highlands where the heat is suffocating, yelling "fish, fish" all because she knows that thanks to her business, she will be able to enjoy having some food in her house.

She lives with her husband, with whom she lives in a humble house made of wood, but her future goal is to build a house made of concrete. 

Edid wants to ask for a loan to formally begin a business selling fish; she will purchase an assortment of fish, basins, and a cart. 

Your loan can help the work of a 59-year-old woman who only wants a better quality of life for herself and her husband.

loans.use: to formally begin a business selling fish; she will purchase an assortment of fish, basins, and a cart.

loans.name: Yakelin

texts.es:
Yakelin es una joven emprendedora de 21 años de edad, que solicita tu ayuda para iniciar un negocio de cría de aves, tendrá pollos y gallinas.

Decidió pedir esta apoyo ya que ella quien es soltera y sin hijos quiere estudiar, capacitarse, demostrar a su familia que tienen un miembro que se conformara hasta lograr ser una profesional con título universitario, por ello al saber que sus padres no tienen el capital para pagarle el estudio busca de alguna u otra manera pagárselo.

Con el préstamo solicitado ella comprara pollos, malla para cercar un terreno, construirá bebederos y comprara el alimento para un mes, será su primer paso en un negocio que se lo enseño su padre y tiene toda la convicción de que con este saldrá adelante.
texts.en:
Yakelin is an enterprising young woman, 21 years old, who asks for your help to begin a business raising birds. She will have hens and chicks.

She decided to ask for this loan since she is single without children and wants to study, be trained, and show her family that they have a member who will work until she manages to be a professional with a university degree. So, upon finding out that her parents don't have the capital to pay for her education, she is looking for some way or another to pay for it.  

With the requested loan, she will purchase chickens, mesh to fence in some land; she will build water dispensers and will purchase the feed for a month. It will be her first step in a business that her father taught her and she has all the conviction that with it, she will get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase chickens, feed, and mesh to fence in her land.

loans.name: Mildry Luz

texts.es:
Ella es Mildry es una mujer humilde, no cuenta con mucho pero lo quiere todo, como pueden observar ese es su hogar, no tiene cerámica, paredes de concreto, solo algo de tierra y madera, pero quiere transformar todo su hogar en algo lindo, revocado, con porcelana, con una fachada linda, pero ella mujer de 29 años de edad madre de dos hijos de 10 y 4 años como lo piensa hacer?.
Ella Iniciara un negocio, que será un cibercafé, que para las personas de la región es todo un artilugio y de verdad lo gozaran aparte que encontraran una impresión cerca de su casa.

Por ello pide su apoyo y lo necesita mucho pues no cuenta con el capital para realizar las siguientes comprar; compra de impresora multifuncional y compra de un computador con estos dos elementos iniciaría su empresa.

Tu préstamo ayudara a una mujer humilde a tener un negocio con el cual pueda generar dinero para la consecución de sus sueños, como pagar la educación de sus hijos o reconstruir su casa en material (concreto)
texts.en:
Mildry is a humble woman. She doesn't have much, but she wants everything. As you can see, this is her house, it doesn't have tiles or concrete walls, only something from dirt and wood, but she wants to transform her whole house into something pretty, plastered, with porcelain, with a pretty front, but she is a 29-year-old woman, the mother of two children, ages 10 and 4, so how can she think of doing it?

She will undertake a business, which will be a cyber cafe, which for the people in the region is a novelty and truly they will enjoy it, apart from finding a printer near their house.

So, she asks for your support and she needs it a lot because she doesn't have the capital to make the following purchases: she will buy a multi-functional printer and will buy a computer; with these two items she will begin her business. 

Your loan will help a humble woman to have a business with which she can generate money to realize her dreams, such as pay for her children's education and build a house of concrete.

loans.use: to purchase a multi-function printer and purchase a computer; with these two items, she will begin her business.

loans.name: Martir

texts.es: Mártir, tiene 31 años de edad, esta casado, tiene 3 hijos, vive en aldea de la Iguala Lempira. Lleva 11 años de tener sus propios cultivos de café y granos básicos como maíz y frijoles. El café lo vende despulpado y seco en la misma zona, siendo esta actividad la que le genera ingresos para su familia. El préstamo que solicita es el séptimo ciclo que es por 27,000 lempiras para comprar abonos, foliar y aplicarle al cultivo de café, con el fin de mejorar la producción. Su meta es seguir cultivando y darle un buen patrimonio a su familia en el futuro.
texts.en: Mártir is 31 years old, married, has 3 children, and lives in the village of Iguala Lempira. He has had his own crops of coffee grains such as corn and beans for 11 years. He sells the coffee, pulped and dry, in the same zone. This is the work that generates income for his family. The loan that he asks for is his seventh loan cycle and is for 27,000 lempiras to purchase manure, liquid fertilizer and to apply it to the coffee crop, with the end of improving his production. His goal is to continue cultivating and leave a good inheritance to his family in the future.

loans.use: to purchase manure, liquid fertilizer and to apply it to his coffee crop.

loans.name: Saren's Group

texts.en:
Saren’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Saren makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these group members to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Pha's Group

texts.en:
Pha’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Pha makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Monday

texts.en: Monday is 35 years old, married with one child and lives in Kasese Uganda. He has been operating a general store for two years. He began the business to generate a daily income for his family, alongside earning a monthly salary from other sources. Monday has a dream of having a bright future and buying land for farming. He has requested a loan to buy sugar, salt, millet flour, cassava flour and soap for his store.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt, millet flour, cassava flour and soap to sell.

loans.name: Kenzhegul

texts.ru: Кенжегул, 34 года, замужем, есть 3 детей. У Кенжегул- среднее образование, в качестве дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 12 лет назад. Благодаря целеустремленности и трудолюбию Кенжегул, на сегодняшний день у нее в хозяйстве есть 3 коровы, 18 овец, лошадь. Этот бизнес приносит Кенжегул и ее семье хорошую прибыль в размере до 22,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку крупно рогатого скота. Таким образом она сможет получать большую прибыль от бизнеса, что позволит улучшить благосостояние ее семьи.
texts.en: Kenzhegul, 34, is married and has three children. She has a high school diploma. Her family’s primary sources of income are livestock breeding and land cultivation. They started out 12 years ago. Through her persistence and hard work, Kenzhegul owns three cows, a horse and eighteen sheep. This business bring Kenzhegul and her family good monthly profits of up to 22,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS). Hoping to expand her business even further, Kenzhegul is requesting a loan of 150,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum bank in order to buy additional cattle. This will help her to increase profits and, consequently, to improve her family’s well-being.

loans.use: to purchase additional cattle in order to increase her livestock headcount

loans.name: Gumercindo

texts.es:
Gumercindo, tiene 40 años de edad, es casado, tiene 4 hijos y vive en una comunidad del Municipio de  Gracias, Lempira.
Gumercindo se dedica a la agricultura, especificamente, a la produccion y venta de cafe. El cual comercializa en pergamino y seco en el mercado local, y se lo pagan a buen precio. Tiene mas de once años dedicado a esta actividad que desde entonces le ha generado los ingresos que ha necesitado para el sostenimiento de su familia. Ha solicitado el sexto ciclo de préstamo en la institución que es por 26,000 Lempiras para compra de fertilizante y pago de mano de obra para darle buena asistencia técnica a su finca de café y poder sacar mejores cosechas. Esta inversion le ayudara a mantener sus cultivos libre de plagas mejorando así la cosecha y los ingresos. El plan a futuro que tiene es primero terminar una casa que esta haciendo para su hijo mayor y ayudar a los otros hijos con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Gumercindo is 40 years old, married, has 4 children, and lives in a community of the municipality of Gracias, Lempira.

Gumercindo works in agriculture, specifically producing and selling coffee, which he sells in the husk and dry in the local market and he is paid a good price. He has been doing this work for more than eleven years which, since then, has generated the income that he has needed to sustain his family. He has asked for his sixth loan cycle with the institution, which is for 26,000 lempiras, to purchase fertilizer and pay labor costs to give him good skilled assistance on his coffee plantation and to be able to have a better harvest. This investment will help him to maintain his crops free of pesticides, improving in this way the harvest and income. The plan that he has for the future is to first finish a house that he is building for his oldest son and to help his other children with their education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer to maintain his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Hun's Group

texts.en:
Hun’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Hun makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Enoc Ediel

texts.es:
Enoc es un pequeño productor que vive junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 2 y 8 años de edad, en una pequeña finca al norte de Nicaragua. Desde pequeño, él ayudaba en las labores de la finca de su familia, por lo que siempre se ha dedicado a las actividades agrícolas, en particular a la producción de café ya que la zona donde creció y vive actualmente, es un área con alto potencial para este rubro.

El sueño de Enoc es tener una finca productiva y sostenible, para lo cual se ha propuesto n plan de mejoramiento de su finca. Como parte de ese proceso, él está solicitando un financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas que le permita asegurar un incremento en los rendimientos productivos de su cafetal este ciclo, y con ello obtener mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Enoc is a small producer who lives with his wife and their two children, ages 2 and 8, on a small farm in northern Nicaragua. Since he was small, he helped with his family's farm work, so he has always worked in agricultural activities, particularly in coffee production, since in the zone where he grew up and where he currently lives, it is an area with a high potential for this type of work. 

Enoc's dream is to have a productive and sustainable farm, for which he has proposed a plan to improve his farm. As part of this process, he is asking for a loan to purchase agricultural supplies which will allow him to ensure an increase in the production levels of his coffee crop this season, and with it, get more income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies which he will apply to his coffee crops.

loans.name: Neang's Group

texts.en:
Neang’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Neang makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Nin's Group

texts.en:
Nin’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Nin makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a tailor and seller to support her family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help all of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Mao's Group

texts.en:
Mao, 62, is a mother of six children, living in Battambang province. 

Growing rice and selling grocery items have been the sources of her family’s income for ten years. 

Due to the lack of funds, she is now leading a group to apply for a loan with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner. She wants to buy seeds, fertilizer and pesticide for her farming. Through this loan, she hopes she could earn more money and improve her family’s living.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and pesticide.

loans.name: Teoung's Group

texts.en:
Teoung’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Teoung makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help both of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Mwaikusowa Group

texts.en:
Chrissy is a widow with seven children of whom five go to school. She owns a grocery store where she sells various kinds of commodities. She started this business in order to financially support her family and to provide her children with basic needs. 

Intending to expand her grocery store business while her sources of funds are low, she applied for a loan in order to purchase more items, so as to increase her profits.  

Her main goal is to send her children to private schools. The loans have helped her to be food sufficient throughout the year.

loans.use: to buy assorted items to sell in her store.

loans.name: José Alcides

texts.es:
José Alcides es un productor con 37 años de edad. Vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos en su pequeña finca, que se ubica al norte de Nicaragua. Para esta pareja, su finca y lo que ahí producen es la principal fuente de ingresos para su familia, por lo que trabajan juntos para lograr tener una finca productiva y sostenible.

Hace tres años su producción café, era de 12 quintales pergamino, logrando en el último ciclo, cosechar hasta 50 quintales; esto demuestra el esfuerzo que José Alcides ha venido realizando en su finca con pequeñas inversiones.

Para este año, este pequeño emprendedor está solicitando un financiamiento para comprar los insumos agrícolas que le permitan asegurar la nutrición de su cafetal y lograr la meta que se ha propuesta de continuar incrementando los rendimientos de su café. 

El sueño de José Alcides y su esposa es aumentar sus ingresos para darle a sus hijos mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
José Alcides is a 37-year-old producer. He lives with his wife and their three children on a small farm, which is located in the north of Nicaragua. For this couple, their farm and what they produce there is the primary source of income for their family, so that they work together to manage to have a productive and sustainable farm.

Three years ago, his coffee production was 12 quintales in the husk, and they managed in the last season to harvest 50 quintales. This shows the effort that José Alcides has been putting into his farm with small investments.

For this year, this small entrepreneur is asking for a loan to purchase agricultural supplies that will allow them to assure the nutrition for the crops and achieve the goal which they have set to continue growing the production of his coffee.

José Alcides and his wife dream of increasing their income to give their children better conditions.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies which will ensure a good coffee harvest.

loans.name: Nyakitojo Tweyimukye Group

texts.en:
Immaculate is a member of Nyakitojo Tweyimukye group, in which members guarantee each other. She is 40 years old and has seven children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. 

She has a business of selling goats, matooke (green plantain), roasted meat and porridge fresh drink. She faces challenges of her customers delaying to pay her, thus hindering the progress of her business. However, she has future hopes of educating all her children to higher levels of learning. 

Immaculate intends to use the loan to buy matooke, goats and roasted meat to sell.

loans.use: to buy matooke, goats and roasted meat to sell.

loans.name: Anarbu

texts.ru: Анарбу, 33 года, не замужем, детей нет. Образование у Анарбу среднее, занимаются животноводством. По характеру она очень приятная и отзывчивая женщина, очень ответственная и трудолюбивая. В хозяйстве есть 8 коров, 60 овец.  Ее доход составляет в среднем 26,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. Анарбу решила развить свою деятельность. Для этого она обратилась в Банк «Бай - Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 125,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец и коровы с теленком для увеличения поголовья скота. На прибыль от кредита Анарбу планирует и дальше развивать ее деятельность, чтобы накопить на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Anarbu, 33, is single and has no children. She has a high school diploma and makes her living from livestock breeding. Anarbu is a very gentle, kind-hearted, responsible and hardworking woman.  She owns eight cows and sixty sheep.  Her average monthly income is 26,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS). Anarbu decided to expand her business. She is requesting a loan of 125,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum bank to buy additional sheep, a cow and a calf in order to increase her herd. She plans to invest the profits in expanding her business even further. This will help her to save money to renovate her house.

loans.use: to purchase additional sheep, a cow and a calf in order to increase her livestock headcount

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Mom

texts.en: Mom is a rural villager living in Kampong Cham province. She, 29, is a mother of two children, and one of them is in school while the other one is too young to attend school. Growing rice on two hectares of farmland and feeding ducks are the sources of her family’s income. She has been involved in this business for ten years and she can earn about 46,000 KHR per day. Due to lack of funds, she is now applying for a Kiva loan via VisionFund to buy duck feed and rice seeds. She hopes her businesses will be expanded through this loan.

loans.use: to buy duck feed

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Chanthorn's Group

texts.en:
Chanthorn’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Chanthorn makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help both of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Pov's Group

texts.en: Pov’s group lives in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Pov makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Sokunthea's Group

texts.en:
Sokunthea is 32 and a mother of three children. Two of her children are in school while the other one is too young to get in school. Sokunthea lives in the Battambang province. For the past seven years, her family has earned an income from cassava farming and working for other farms. Sokunthea is able to earn about 81,000 KHR each day to support her family. She does not have enough funds to grow her crops.

Sokunthea is the leader of a group loan through VisionFund. She will use her portion of the loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, and to pay for plowing fees. Sokunthea hopes to earn more income and expand her current business.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and pay for plowing fees

loans.name: Pech

texts.en:
Pech, 49, lives in a small community of the Banteay Meanchey province, Cambodia. He is a father of three children. To make a living he manages and operates a farming business, grows rice for sale, and earns on average USD 5 a day. So far, he has been in this career for more than 20 years.
 
He wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in his house now. Therefore, he is borrowing a loan from Kiva to build a latrine. By doing this, he can help his family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. He is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Razanadrasoa

texts.fr:
Razanadrasoa a 55 ans. Elle a 4 enfants dont un encore à sa charge et qui est âgé de 13 ans. Les trois autres ne dépendent plus d'elle, ils sont déjà autonomes.
C'est une femme seule, son mari l'a quitté juste après l'accouchement de leur dernier bébé. Elle a dû soutenir seule ses enfants depuis. C'est une femme courageuse et travailleuse. Elle vend différentes sortes de marchandises de première nécessité  non périssable. Elle a commencé cette activité en l'an 2000, mais elle était femme au foyer auparavant pour s'occuper du ménage et de sa famille.
Elle veut développer l'activité: augmenter la quantité et diversifier davantage les marchandises. Elle est très consciente de sa lutte car il y a encore un enfant sous sa responsabilité, son désir est de le faire réussir dans la vie. Elle rêve ainsi de pouvoir construire une maison un jour.
texts.en:
Razanadrasoa is 55 years old. She has four children including one aged 13, who is still dependent on her. The three others no longer depend on her, they are already autonomous. This woman is alone, her husband left her just after she delivered their last baby. Since that time she has had to provide for her children. She is brave and hard-working. She sells various imperishable basic necessities. She started this business in 2000, but before that she was a housewife who looked after her family and her home.
She wants to expand her business: to increase the quantity of her stock and to increase the diversity of her products. She is very aware of the effort she needs to make for she is still responsible for one child. Her dearest wish is to help that child succeed in life. Her dream is to build a house one day.

loans.use: to buy plastic clothes pegs, bowls, plates, combs, mirrors and albums.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family

loans.name: Doreen

texts.en:
Doreen is a 25-year-old married woman with two children. One of her children attends school. Doreen lives in Kasese, Uganda, and she operates a business selling produce such as rice, millet flour, maize flour, and beans. She gets additional income from farming. Doreen is a hardworking lady who is affected by market competition within her business community.

Doreen is requesting a loan to pay school fees for her children. Her dream is to expand her business and educate her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children

loans.name: Hang's Group

texts.en:
Hang’s group lives in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Hang makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. In her village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. 

Hang is requesting a loan to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses. They will also save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family

loans.name: Neang

texts.en: Neang is a rural villager living in Kampong Cham province. She is 29 years old and a mother of two children. Her family’s living is dependent on growing rice on one hectare of farmland and growing cassava on two hectares of farmland. She has been involved in these businesses for 10 years. Due to lack of funds, she is now applying for a loan with VisionFund to buy seeds and fertilizer for her farming. She hopes her crops will grow well and provide her more yields than last year.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Francisco Antonio

texts.es:
Francisco un hombre de 34 años de edad, un hombre que le sonríe a la vida, es un productor agropecuario inicio con su actividad en el año 2005 y desde entonces muy orgullo y contento puede decir que ha mejorado las condiciones de vida de su familia que la conforma su pareja y dos hijos de 13 y 10 años de edad, inicio su negocio por vocación al trabajo, aprendió de su madre y está capacitando a sus hijos para que sean unos potenciales agricultores, quiere que este negocio se transmita de generación en generación.

Francisco quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de insumos de mantenimiento de cultivos como lo son gallinaza, pesticidas e insumos para la preparación de tierra como lo son abonos y tener canales de riego y plantación, por ultimo semillas.

La solicitud del préstamo tiene una razón y es que Francisco no cuenta con el capital suficiente para comprar estos insumos que son tan costosos.

Francisco sueña con dejar el negocio a sus hijos, por ello quiere hacer crecer el cultivo todo lo que pueda, para que les quede buen terreno para trabajar.

Es muy importante este préstamo ya que estarías estimulando la agricultura y apoyando a un gremio que está un poco descuidado como lo son los agricultores que trabajan diariamente pro llevar el alimento a los hogares.
texts.en:
Francisco is a 34 year old man. He is a man who smiles at life. He is a farmer who started his activity in 2005 and since then can say proudly and happily that he has improved his and his family's standard of living. His family is his wife and two children, aged 13 and 10. He started his business because he had a vocation for the work. He learned from his mother and he is teaching his children so they can be potential farmers. He wants this business to pass from generation to generation.  

Francisco wants to ask for a loan to buy materials to maintain his crops, such as chicken manure, pesticides and materials for soil preparation like fertilizer and irrigation canals for watering and planting. Lastly, he will buy seeds. 

There is a reason for the loan application, and that is that Francisco doesn't have enough capital to buy these expensive materials.  

Francisco dreams of leaving the business to his children. To do that, he wants to grow his expand his crop as much as he can, so he can leave them good land to work. 

This loan is very important because it will be stimulating agriculture and supporting  the trade of farming, which has been a little neglected. Farmers work every day to bring food to families.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds and irrigation materials to prepare the soil for planting.

loans.name: Mirna Del Carmen

texts.es:
Mirna, de 45 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, sus padres le enseñaron las actividades de la agricultura y la ganadería, trabaja de esa manera desde hace varios años; está casada y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, tiene 4 hijos que le colaboran en las tareas agrícolas. 

Mirna, se dedica junto a su esposo a trabajar en las parcelas que alquila, en el transcurso de la tarde, se dedica a ordeñar las vacas que poseen, para vender la leche en los alrededores de su comunidad.


Mirna, necesita el crédito para iniciar con la crianza y engorde de cerdos, es un negocio muy rentable en donde ella espera mejores ingresos para el sustento de su familia.

Mirna, desea construir una galera para tener más seguros a sus animales.
texts.en:
Mirna, 45 years old, went to school up to the ninth grade. Her parents taught her the work of agriculture and animal husbandry. She has worked in this way for a number of years. She is married and her husband works in agriculture. They have 4 children who help with the agricultural work.

Mirna works with her husband to work the land that he rents, during the afternoon she milks the cows they have, to sell the milk in the areas near their community.

Mirna needs the loan to begin raising and fattening pigs. It is a very profitable business in which she expects more income to sustain her family.

Mirna wants to build a shed to keep her animals more safe.

loans.use: to begin raising and fattening pigs.

loans.name: Carlos Mario

texts.es:
Carlos, de 38 años de edad, está casado, estudio hasta sexto grado, vive junto a su esposa y sus 2 hijos.

Carlos, se levanta a las 4:30 a.m. junto a su esposa para iniciar con las tareas agrícolas, durante la mañana, específicamente se dedican a la agricultura, lo aprendieron de sus padres.- Carlos, trabaja durante la mañana en la agricultura, mientras su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a ordeñar la vacas que poseen para vender la leche en los alrededores de su comunidad.

Carlos, está solicitando el crédito para sembrar 9,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y necesita comprar el abono, semilla, veneno y pagar el alquiler de la tierra. Con esta inversión espera  obtener  una buena cosecha de maíz.

Carlos, con los ingresos que obtenga de la venta de leche y de la siembra, comprar un vehículo para dedicarse a realizar viajes.
texts.en:
Carlos, 38 years old, is married, went to school up to the sixth grade, and lives with his wife and their 2 children.

Carlos gets up at 4:30 am with his wife to begin the agricultural work. During the morning, they specifically work in agriculture, they learned it from their parents. Carlos works during the morning in agriculture while his wife takes care of the domestic tasks and milks the cows they have to sell the milk in the areas near their community. 

Carlos is asking for the loan to plant 9,000 square meters of corn and he needs to purchase the manure, seeds, chemical poison and to pay the rent for the land. With this investment, he hopes to get a good corn harvest.

Carlos, with the income that he gets from the milk sales and from the crops, plans to purchase a vehicle to travel.

loans.use: to plant 9,000 square meters of corn and to purchase manure, seeds, chemical poisons and to pay rent for the land.

loans.name: Sreybang

texts.en:
Sreybang is 25 years old. She is a married mother of a child who is too young for school. Sreybang is a rural villager living in Kampong Cham province. To earn money to support her family, she grows cassava on three hectares of farmland and sells clothes. Sreybang has been involved in these businesses for seven years and is challenged by the lack of funds.

Sreybang is requesting a loan with VisionFund to buy seeds, pesticide, and pay labor fees. She hopes to improve her yields and be able to buy farmland to expand her farm.

loans.use: to buy seeds, pesticide and pay labor fees

loans.name: Fidel Angel

texts.es:
Fidel, de 44 años de edad, no pudo estudiar porque desde pequeño sus padres lo llevaban a trabajar en las labores agrícolas y en el cuido del ganado, es viudo y sus hijos tienen sus propios hogares. 

Fidel, se dedica a la agricultura, trabaja en la parcela que alquila durante la mañana y en la tarde ordeñar las vacas que posee, para vender la leche con sus vecinos.

Fidel, necesita el crédito para comprar una vaca, que le permita incrementar la producción de leche para la venta y para obtener ingresos adicionales. 

Fidel, desea comprar más vacas y comprar un terreno para pastarlas, todo lo espera comprar con las ganancias que le genere la cosecha y la venta de lácteos.
texts.en:
Fidel, 44 years old, couldn't go to school because ever since he was little, his parents brought him to work in the agricultural tasks and to care for the cattle. He is a widower and his children have their own homes. 

Fidel works in agriculture. He works, on a plot of land that he rents, during the morning and in the afternoon he milks the cows he has to sell the milk with his neighbors. 

Fidel needs the loan to purchase a cow which will allow him to increase his milk production for sale and to get additional income. 

Fidel wants to purchase more cows and to purchase a plot of land to graze them, all which he hopes to buy with the earnings which the harvest and the dairy sales generate.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: H. F. Marie Madeleine

texts.fr:
Marie Madeleine a 21 ans. C'est une jeune femme dynamique et débrouillarde, elle a un adorable petit garçon de 2 ans pas encore scolarisé. Elle est mariée, son marri est mécanicien et il travaille pour son propre compte.
Elle vend des peluches à l'occasion comme nous pouvons voir sur sa photo. Elle exerçait cette activité avant même son mariage. 
Elle voudrait encore développer son affaire et augmenter davantage son revenu afin de pouvoir offrir une meilleure qualité de vie à sa famille. 
C'est une femme de forte personnalité qui désire avancer avec ses propres efforts sans dépendre d'autrui. Elle rêve pouvoir construire sa propre maison avec son épargne pour éviter de louer longtemps.
texts.en:
Marie Madeleine is 21 years old. She is dynamic and resourceful, she has an adorable little boy of two, who does not yet go to school. She is married. Her husband is an independent mechanic.
She sells soft toys from time to time as we can see in the photo. She worked in this business even before her marriage.
She would like to expand her business and increase her income in order to give her family a better quality of life.
Marie Madeleine has a strong personality. She wants to progress independently without having to answer to anyone else. She dreams of being able to build her own house with her savings so that she does not have to rent for a long time.

loans.use: To buy more soft toys.

loans.name: Gisela

texts.es:
Gisela tiene 36 años de edad, vive en casa familiar en una comunidad tranquila, donde la gente se dedica al comercio, ganadería y agricultura, se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Zaña, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales como cerdos, carneros, patos, pollos, pavos, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio, realiza esta actividad desde hace más de 5 años por lo que cuenta con experiencia en este sector y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El préstamo lo utilizará para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para su negocio así como alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos, con esto Gisela espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de animales a sus clientes lo que incrementará su nivel de ventas y le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Gisela is 36 years old, and lives in the family home in a peaceful community where the people work in trade, animal husbandry and agriculture and is located in Zaña district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. 

She works raising and selling animals such as pigs, rams, ducks, chickens, turkeys, among others. Her business is located at her home. She has done this work for more than 5 years so she has experience in this sector and has good personal and work references in her district. The loan will be used to purchase a greater quantity of animals for her business and also balanced feed to fatten them. With this, Gisela hopes to offer a wider variety of animals to her customers, which will increase her level of sales and will allow her to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of animals for her business as well as balanced feed to fatten them.

loans.name: Diana Lucrecia

texts.es: Diana, tiene la edad  de 19 años, está soltera, vive con su madre y hermanos, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de materiales para mejorar la estructura de un invernadero para utilizarlo en la siembra de diferentes hortalizas, con la compra de estas materiales espera ser más eficiente y realizar los trabajos de la mejor manera y con una calidad mas alta. La idea es aprovechar el conocimiento que ha tenido a lo largo de los años de trabajar en este campo y con las mejoras en sus técnicas espera aumentar la producción. Con esta compra podrá desarrollar con más facilidad los trabajos, y a la vez tener un ahorro que le permitirá ir teniendo más  en su actividad.  Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Diana is 19 years old. She is single and lives with her mother and siblings, who are her biggest priority. With her loan, she intends on buying materials to improve the structure of a greenhouse to use it to plant different vegetables. By purchasing these materials, she hopes to have be more efficient and do work in the best way and the highest quality. The idea to to use the knowledge she has gained over the years she has worked in this field and with the improvements in her technique increase production. With this purchase, she can develop her work with more facility and have some saving which will allow her to have more in her activity. This is the first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. She has not had any other loans before in state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered her a loan with more ease of payment and a much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: to do improvements to her greenhouse.

loans.name: Ademar

texts.es: Ademar, tiene la edad  de 40 años, está en unión libre,  vive con su esposa, la cual es su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra  de fertilizantes adecuados para el estado de cosecha en que se encuentra el cultivo de café, además realizar algunos trabajos de mejoramiento del suelo por medio de labores culturales como lo es evitar la erosión del suelo por medio del agua de lluvia, además pagar mano de obra para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación, de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo de café, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de este cultivo. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en el cultivo. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Ademar is 40 years old, in a common-law marriage, and lives with his wife, who is his greatest priority. With his loan, he plans to purchase appropriate fertilizers for the harvest stage in which his coffee crop is in. In addition, he will do some work to improve the soil through cultivation work which is preventing soil erosion through rain water, in addition to paying labor costs to apply the products and assist on the plantation. In this way, he will assure himself of doing good work. What he plans is to take advantage of the good climatic and soil conditions that the zone has for this coffee cultivation and also put into practice the experience of a number of years that he has managing this crop.

In addition to being able to purchase the best and highest-quality products so that his plantation has good development and health as well as a fitting harvest and to have, in the short term, a significant production. He wants to use the income from the harvest, that he hopes to get, for the well-being of his family and to achieve some family goals and continue investing more in his crop. It is the first loan that he is getting through FUDECOSUR. He has never had other loans in government banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to pay for assistance for the coffee.

loans.name: Hidoyat

texts.en:
Hidoyat is a conscientious woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1979. She lives in the remote district of Panj with her family. She is married and has two children. She has seven years of experience working for the government in this remote district as a social worker. 

It is cold during the winter season in Panj, and in order to improve her quality of life and not get cold in the winter she has decided to buy a heater/air conditioner. She appealed to IMON and asked for help in buying a heater/air conditioner for her house. She awaits KIVA lenders' kindness.

loans.use: to buy a heater/air conditioner for her house for the winter season

loans.name: Bagdaiym

texts.ru: Бвгдайым, 49 лет, замужем, есть 5 детей. У нее средне-специальное образование, работает уборщицей в сельской школе. Также  много лет занимается полеводством и животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду и целеустремленности Бвгдайым, на сегодняшний день у нее имеется 0,70 ГА собственного и 1,0 ГА арендованного земельного надела, где она ежегодно выращивает ячмень для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Также в хозяйстве есть 4 коровы, 30 овец. На ежедневной основе продает молоко. Ежемесячный доход от сельскохозяйственной деятельности составляет до 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Бвгдайым обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) для покупки коров для увеличения поголовья скота, летом она отгонит их на пастбище. Бвгдайым намерена развить свой бизнес, что позволит накопить на покупку автомобиля.
texts.en: Bagdaiym, 49, is married and has five children. She has vocational secondary education and works as a cleaner at a village school. In addition, for many years she has been cultivating land and breeding livestock. Through her hard work and persistence, Bagdaiym now owns 0.70 ha and rents 1.0 ha of land where she grows barley for farm consumption and for sale. She also has four cows and thirty sheep. She sells milk on a daily basis. She has a monthly income of about 15,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS). Hoping to expand her business even further, Bagdaiym is requesting a loan of 150,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum bank to buy additional cows. In the summer she will send the cows to the pasture. Bagdaiym aspires to expand her business, which will help her to save money for a car.

loans.use: to buy additional cows in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Félix Antonio

texts.es:
A sus 44 años de edad don Félix es un productor ejemplo en la comunidad donde vive. Tiene 5 hijos y todos están estudiando. Siempre ha mostrado disposición para aprender y hacer mejor las cosas. Para él cada día de su jornada laboral es una oportunidad para darle a su familia mejores condiciones económicas. 

La meta de este productor para los próximos 5 años, es contar con una producción estable, de al menos 55 quintales de café pergamino por manzana, pero asegura que esto solo lo logrará contando con un manejo adecuado de su cafetal. Para ello, está solicitando un crédito para garantizar el mantenimiento de su café en este ciclo y tener una mejor productividad y mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
At 44 years old, Félix is a model producer in the community where he lives. He has 5 children and all of them are students. He has always shown a disposition for learning and improving things. For him, each day of his daily work is an opportunity to give his family better economic conditions.

This producer's goal for the next 5 years is to have stable production, of at least 55 quintales of parchment coffee per manzana, but he says that this only will be managed with an adequate management of the coffee crop. For this, he is asking for a loan to guarantee the care of his coffee in this season and to have better productivity and increased income for his family.

loans.use: to care for his coffee crops and manage to have a good harvest this season.

loans.name: Gulzat

texts.ru: Гульзат успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. На сегодняшний день у Гульзат есть: 4 дойные коровы, 4 теленка, 2 лошади, 30 овец. Также Гульзат ежедневно реализует молоко и молочную продукцию. На 2,80 Га земли выращивает клевер для реализации. Гульзат в целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, вновь обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) для покупки 2 трехмесячных бычков для увеличения поголовья скота, что позволит ей накопить на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Having used her loan as planned, Gulzat has successfully paid it back. She is grateful to Kiva and all those who funded her loan. She now owns four dairy cows, four calves, two horses and thirty sheep. She sells milk and other dairy products on a daily basis and grows clover for sale on a 2.8 ha plot of land. Hoping to expand her business even further, Gulzat is requesting a loan of 60,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum bank to buy two three-month bull calves to increase her herd. This will help her to save money to renovate her home.

loans.use: to buy two three-month bull calves to increase her herd

loans.name: Angel David

texts.es: Ángel, tiene 39 años de edad, esta casado, tiene dos hijos y reside con su familia en una aldea del municipio de Concepción del Sur, Santa Bárbara. Toda su vida la ha dedicado a la agricultura, ganadería y cría de cerdos, lleva 6 años de realizar cultivos de café, el cual le genera mayor ingreso. El esta solicitando el tercer ciclo de préstamo en ODEF por la cantidad de 10,000 Lempiras con el cual va comprar fertilizantes e insumos para fertilizar su finca y esperar buena cosecha. Su plan es llegar a tener una finca mejor para que a su familia no le falte nada.
texts.en: Angel, thirty-nine years old, is married with two children and lives with his family in a village in the municipality of Concepción del Sur, Santa Barbara. He has worked in agriculture his whole life, raising cattle and pigs. He has been growing coffee for six years, which generates more income.  He is requesting the third cycle of his loan in ODEF in the amount of 10,000 Lempiras, which he will use to buy fertilizers and supplies to fertilize his plantation and hope for a good harvest. His plan is to eventually have a better plantation so his family will not lack for anything.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and supplies  for his coffee plantation

loans.name: Carmenza

texts.es:
Carmenza es una mujer de 41 años de edad, madre de dos hijos menores, se separó de su esposo, quedando como madre cabeza de familia, para generar recursos aprovecho los conocimientos que adquirió de una vecina en confecciones, junto un pequeño capital que tenía y compro una máquina y arranco con su negocio de confección a terceros.

Para conseguir los clientes tuvo que asistir a muchas reuniones donde explicaba su situación y que quería contratos para que probaran su calidad y su cumplimento de entrega, ella misma busco su trabajo y conforme iba pasando el tiempo iba adquiriendo más clientes.

Su anhelo es tener una empresa generadora de empleo que no solo genere recursos para el mantenimiento de sus necesidades básicas sino que pueda mejorar calidad de vida, comprar vivienda, que le dé carro, oportunidad de viajar, que sus hijos estudien o si no para que se hizo empresaria.

Pensando en su primer deseo quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de una máquina plana y una máquina de doble de aguja, una maquinaria que necesita para su negocio y con la que podrá contactar una persona que será su primera empleada.
texts.en:
Carmenza is a 41-year-old woman, the mother of two minor children. She separated from her husband, remaining as the female head of household. To generate resources she took advantage of the knowledge of sewing that she got from a neighbor. She gathered a little capital that she had and purchased a machine and opened her business sewing for third parties.

To get customers, she had to go to many meetings where she explained her situation and that she wanted contracts to prove her quality and her delivery commitment. She looked for her work herself and as time passed, she got more customers. 

Her desire is to have a business which generates jobs that not only generates resources to support her basic needs but that could improve her quality of life, to purchase a house which is expensive, the opportunity to travel, that her children got to school and so that they don't quit, she became a businesswoman. 

Thinking of her first desire, she wants to ask for a loan to purchase a flat machine and a double lock-stitch machine, machinery that she needs for her business and with which she will be able to contact a person who will be her first employee.

loans.use: to purchase a flat machine and a double lock-stitch machine.

loans.name: Phia's Group

texts.en:
Phia, 62, is a rural villager of Kampong Cham province. She is the mother of four children and a cassava and rice farmer for more than ten years. She could earn about 52,000KHR per day to support her family’s needs. 

Due to a lack of funds, she is now leading a group to take a loan with VisionFund, with her portion to pay for plowing fees. She hopes to improve the family’s standard of living and expand her current business.

loans.use: to pay for plowing fees, in the hope of improving the family standard of living

loans.name: Nat's Group

texts.en:
Nat’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Nat makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water at home for their families.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water at home for their family and to save money on medical expenses

loans.name: Hamra Group

texts.en:
Estrella is the featured borrower of the Hamra group. She got along with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua because they have always been friends since they left their hometown in the Philippines to come and work in Lebanon with a better income to support their beloved ones back in the Philippines.

Estrella is a 60-year-old widowed mother of three precious children. She is acquiring a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua to pay for her children's school fees, which is an important thing. She hopes that in the coming years, she will be capable of establishing her own business back in her home country, the Philippines, and to be next to her beloved children while taking good care of them. 

Estrella is the first from the right. As for the other borrowers, Gladice is the first from the left, Ma Elsie is second lady on the left, while Lilia is the second lady on the right of the photo.

loans.use: to pay for her children's school fees

loans.name: Maria Cleotilde

texts.es: Doña María, tiene 55 años de edad, esta casada, tiene 2 hijos y reside en una aldea del municipio de las Flores, Lempira.  Lleva 15 años dedicándose a la agricultura de café junto a su familia. Ofrece café a los intermediarios de la zona y obtiene sus propios ingresos. Ha obtenido varios ciclos de prestamos en la Institución, con el actual es el séptimo préstamo que es por 30,000 Lempiras para pago de mano de obra y compra de abonos y fertilizantes para cultivar mas plantas de café y aplicarle a la finca existente y así  poder obtener mejor producción en la próxima cosecha. Su plan es ampliar el cultivo de café para mejorar los ingresos.
texts.en: María is 55 years old, married, has 2 children, and lives in a village in the municipality of Flores, Lempira. She has been working in growing coffee with her family for 15 years. She sells coffee to the intermediaries in the zone and gets her own income. She has gotten various loan cycles with the Institution, with the current one being her seventh loan which is for 30,000 lempiras to pay labor costs and purchase manure and fertilizer to cultivate more coffee plants and apply them to the existing plantation and, so, to be able to get better production in the next harvest. Her plan is to expand her coffee cultivation to increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizer, pay labor costs to cultivate more coffee plants and fertilize the existing plantation.

loans.name: Jesus Daniel

texts.es:
Como no comprarle a Jesús, como no enamorarse de su carisma, su bondad, su buen trato, este hombre de 64 años de edad que no pierde la sonrisa, las ganas de trabajar, no renuncia a sus sueños, de tener vivienda, de mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Tiene una chaza (ver foto), donde vende dulces, gomas de mascar, plátanos, rosquillas y papas en bolsa, chocolates, cigarrillos, minutos a celular.

El señor Jesús vive junto con su esposa no tiene hijos, por ende la única entrada de dinero con la que cuenta es la rentabilidad que le genera su negocio, por eso quiere trabajarle, necesita de ayuda para mantenerse, y lo puedes hacer prestándole dinero que Jesús invertirá en la compra de surtido de frituras en bolsa, recarga de minutos.

Tu préstamo será de gran ayuda para una persona de 64 años de edad que lucha por pagar sus cuentas, comprar sus medicamentos y estar en una situación económica estable con su señora pero con ayuda de su negocio.

Jesús se compromete a pagar puntualmente sus cuotas ya que le están ando una gran oportunidad de sostenimiento.
texts.en:
How couldn't one purchase from Jesús, how couldn't one fall in love with his charisma, his caring, his good treatment, this 64-year-old man who never loses his smile, the desire to work, who doesn't give up his dreams of having a house of improving his living conditions? He has a stand (see photo) where he sells sweets, chewing gum, bananas, bags of donuts and potato chips, chocolates, cigarettes, and cell phone minutes.

Jesús lives with his wife, doesn't have children, and the only source of money that he has is the profitability that his business generates, so he wants to work it, needs help to sustain it, and you can help by lending him money that Jesús will invest in the purchase of an assortment of packaged snacks and cell phone minutes.

Your loan will be a great help for a 64-year-old person who struggles to pay his bills, purchase his medicines, and be in a stable economic situation with his wife, just with the help of his business.

Jesús promises to punctually make his payments since they are giving him a great opportunity for sustainability.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of packaged snacks, cell phone minutes, sweets, chocolates, and cigarettes.

loans.name: Neang's Group

texts.en:
Neang’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Neang makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as construction worker and seller to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.
