loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water at home for their family and to save fuel needed for boiling water

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es: Andrea fue motivada por su madre para que iniciara un negocio de comidas rápidas, gracias a su experiencia  comercial,  consideró que éste negocio podría ser una fuente de recursos para su hija y su nieta.  Le ofreció la oportunidad de instalar el negocio desde la comodidad de su hogar;  la vivienda está ubicada en una zona comercial, para que pudiera estar más tiempo con su hija.  Andrea adecuó un espacio con sillas, mesas e instrumentos de cocina y aperturó su negocio. Con cuatro años de experiencia en ésta actividad, cada vez son más los comensales que llegan los fines de semana a degustar de las delicias que ella prepara; hamburguesas, salchipapas, perros calientes y asados de diferentes clases de carnes.   Sus compras las realiza a proveedores en el sector de la Cordialidad al suroccidente de la ciudad, los ingredientes con los que prepara sus comidas son de buena calidad y los compra a precio de oportunidad, con el fin de ofrecer precios asequibles a los consumidores.   En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para invertir en salsas, carnes frías, vegetales, carne de res, pollo y canastas de gaseosa. Andrea tiene como meta familiar continuar trabajando en un local más amplio para tener mejores ingresos y con ello ofrecerle bienestar a su hija.
texts.en:
Andrea was motivated by her mother to start up a fast-food business, because of her commercial experience, she thought this business could be a good source of income for her daughter and grand-daughter. She offered her the opportunity to set up the business in the comfort of her home; the house is located in a commercial zone, so she could spend more time with her daughter. Andrea set up a space with tables and chairs, and kitchen tools, and opened her business. 
With four years of experience at this work, every weekend more customers come to enjoy the delicious foods she prepares: hamburgers, fried potatoes, hot dogs, and different kinds of barbecued meats. She buys from suppliers in the Cordialidad sector in the southwest area of the city. The ingredients she uses to prepare her food are high-quality and she purchases them at a good price, so she can offer affordable prices to her customers. Now she is applying for a kiva loan, her first request of the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to invest in sauces, cold meats, vegetables, beef, chicken and soda. Andrea's goal for her family is to continue working in a bigger space, in order to increase her earnings and ensure her daughter's well-being.

loans.use: invest in sauces, cold meats, vegetables, beef, chicken and sodas

loans.name: Sokhom's Group

texts.en:
Sokhom’s group live in a rural village in the Prey Veng province of Cambodia. 

Sokhom makes a living cultivating rice.  She also does extra work as a construction worker and seller to support her family. 

In the group's village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these members to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to purchase a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Reap's Group

texts.en:
Reap’s group live in a rural village in the Prey Veng province of Cambodia. 

Reap makes a living cultivating rice.  She also does extra work as a tailor to support her family. 

In the group's village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these members to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to purchase a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Phy's Group

texts.en:
Phy, 44, is a mother of three children who are all in school.  She lives in Kampong Cham province. 

The sources of her family’s income are from growing cassava on a 1.5 hectares farm and selling cake for ages.  She can earn about 34,700 KHR per day on average. Due to insufficient funds for the farm, she is now leading a group of two to apply for a loan with VisionFund.  She will purchase seeds, pesticide and pay for a plowing fee. 

She hopes her crops will grow well and produce a higher yield.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, pesticide and pay for a plowing fee.

loans.name: Jumagul

texts.en:
Jumagul is 28 years old, is a resident of the district of J.Rumi and a wonderful mother of 2 children. Her husband is a farmer. Jumagul raises cattle with her husband. Together, they have been working in this area for 5 years already. 

She is asking for a loan to purchase a few heads of small cattle and expand her business. Jumagul takes care of the cattle by herself and she is very good at it. Owing to her persistence and decisiveness, Jumagul has always stood out. 

She is confident that her business will continue to do well. Jumagul hopes that you will give her your support.

loans.use: To expand her business and purchase a few heads of small cattle

loans.name: Elisam

texts.en:
Elisam is a 32 year old hard working married man with two children who lives in Kasese Uganda. He operates a mobile money service business and gets additional income from a monthly salary as a health worker. 

He desires to construct his residential house that's why he is requesting a loan to buy building materials such as cement, sand and bricks. Elisam's greatest challenge is poor network problem that affects his mobile money business that entirely relies on network.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as cement,  sand and bricks to build a house.

loans.name: Changxing

texts.en:
Changxing，a fifty-six-year old man is divorced with two children. He has no aging parents need to support, and two of his children are both married. Now, he lives alone and makes a living with opening a tea house. 

The family has long been bogged down in poverty many years ago. They live in a dilapidated house and cannot afford a revamp. As the breadwinner in the family, Changxing has been working outside for several years. He divorced from his wife six years ago. Nowadays, both two children are far away from home, he had to support himself.

With a dream to help his children live a better life, Changxing always lives a poor life. He wants to save the money to help his son to buy a big house in the future. He hopes one day that his family could live in a bigger house and he could have a rest.

Changxing requested ￥15,000 from MicroCred. It is the second time he requested money. With the money he has managed to use one part of the money to purchase some food that he could sell it in his teahouse for customers and gain more income. And the remaining money will be used to support his family.

loans.use: to purchase some food for his teahouse for more income and to help support his family

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cattle to sell.

loans.name: Kun's Group

texts.en:
Kun has been a cassava and rice farmer for more than five years, living in Kampong Cham province. She is 65 years old and a mother of five children. She could earn about 58,300 KHR per day. 

Now Kun is facing a problem, lacking funds to work her farm because her crops did not grow well. That is why she decided to lead a group to take a loan via VisionFund to buy seeds and fertilizer and pay for labor fees. She hopes to earn more money and expand her current business.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer and pay for labor fees

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is a hardworking man aged 34 years with three children. He lives in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He needs a loan to buy more maize for selling. He deals in produce-buying, supplemented by farming. Like other produce business people, Peter is faced with the problem of price fluctuations of agricultural produce. In spite of these, Peter has family dreams of educating his children and putting up a permanent building.

loans.use: to buy more maize for selling.

loans.name: Twizerane Group

texts.en:
Francoise is the group's leader.  She is 32 years old and married with 4 children between the ages of 2 and 13 years. 

Her group is called Twizerane, which means “Trust each other” in English. The members sell different products and they wish to expand their businesses to change their future for the better. 

Francoise has a foodstuff market and has been running this business for 6 years. With this loan, she would like to buy more rice, maize flour and Irish potatoes to sell. 

The profits from the business will be used to improve her welfare and renovate her house.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, maize flour and Irish potatoes to sell.

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en:
Muhammed is 43 years old, a resident of Kikungwe in Rakai district.  He is married with 8 children, 7 of whom are attending school.  He deals in the business of farming, especially the growing of corn, ground nuts and beans, which he started in 2003 with the aim of improving his daily income so that he can adequately meet his family financial obligations. He also deals in transport services which he started in 2010 to supplement his income. 

Muhammed works 7 days in a week and 15 hours per day, and he wants a loan of UGX3,000,000 to buy more stock to meet the demands for his customers. Muhammed has harvested groundnuts but there are not sufficient quantities available to meet the supply on demand.  He therefore needs a loan to increase his stock so that he can meet his customers demands, which will also increase his profit. His hope is to establish a point in the busy centre like Kampala, where his customers can find his products easily and also to be the leading supplier of ground nuts in the market. 

Muhammed’s major customers are the people from different parts of the country especially farmers. However, he faces challenges of inadequate capital and competition in the market. He describes himself as focused and hardworking man who always wants to see himself prospering with services provided to him by lenders.

loans.use: To buy increased stocks of groundnuts, corn and beans to satisfy the demand in the market and to increase his business accordingly

loans.name: Mariela Judith

texts.es:
Mariela es una mujer de 27 años de edad, soltera, tiene un hijo varón de 4 años, y su negocio es la confección de adornos para pared.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, decidida, de buen trato, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona ‘Murillo’ área industrial de la ciudad cuenta con todos los servicios básicos como; agua, luz, alcantarillado y gas. De clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 0-12 grados centígrados.
Mariela es de tez trigueña, ojos pardos, cabello castaño largo lo usa suelto, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. su vida la realiza en compañia de su hijo que aún no se encuentra en edad escolar, viven en un cuarto propiedad de la familia construido de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica, gas domiciliario y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la confección de manualidades en goma eva y otros materiales. Su campo es bastante amplio y realiza; bordados con cintas en punto de cruz para confeccionar casas de muñecas, manteles, muñecos y todo tipo de decoraciones y adornos para fiestas y el hogar,  “inicié mi negocio con la ayuda de un familiar por la necesidad de independizarme y cuidar a mi hijo, compro mis materiales por mayor para confeccionar y vender también por mayor…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que es un rubro nuevo con materiales innovadores que llaman la atención de los clientes, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la compra de materiales de confección. Su sueño es incrementar su producción, contratar mano de obra e incrementar la variedad de productos, ella desea realizar la compra de material de confección como; goma eva, cintas, pegamento, hilos, lana, telas y otros. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que desarrolla esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Mariela solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales para la confección de manualidades para vender por mayor y abrir una tienda.
texts.en:
Mariela is a 27-year-old woman. She is single and has a 4-year-old son. She has a business making wall decorations.

Mariela is a good mother, and she is entrepreneurial, dedicated, fair, responsible, and hardworking. She runs her business in the 'Murillo' area, an industrial part of the city. Her business has all of the basic services such as water, electricity, a sewage system, and gas. The weather is cold and dry in this area, with a temperature that varies during the day between 0-12 degrees centigrade.

Mariela has light brown skin, brown eyes, and long chestnut-colored hair which she wears down. She is short with a thin physical build. Her native language is Aymará which she speaks with her family, and she also speaks Spanish for general purposes and in her business. She lives her life alongside her son who is not old enough for school yet. They live in a room on property owned by the family, which is made of bricks and cement with a corrugated iron roof. They have potable water, electricity, gas, and a sewage system.

Mariela has a business making handicrafts of EVA and other materials. The scope of her work is broad, and she does cross-stitch embroideries to make doll houses, tablecloths, dolls, and all other sorts of decorations for parties and for the home. "With the help of a relative, I started my business because of the necessity to become independent and care for my son. I buy my materials at wholesale to make my products and sell them at wholesale as well..." says Mariela. The benefit of her business is that it's a new type of item that she is selling, made of innovative materials that catch the customer's attention. The drawback of her business is the lack of capital to buy materials.

Her dream is to increase the production of her business, hire laborers, and increase the variety of products that she sells. She would like to buy materials for production such as EVA, tape, glue, thread, yarn, fabrics, and other things. This is Mariela's first loan with the institution in the 2 years that she has run her business.

For these reasons, Mariela is requesting a loan to buy materials to produce handicrafts to sell at wholesale and to open a store.

loans.use: to buy supplies for the production of handicrafts to sell at wholesale and to open a store.

loans.name: Vin's Group

texts.en:
Vin’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Vin makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as tailor to support her family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water at home for their family.

loans.name: Chea's Group

texts.en:
Chea’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Chea makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water at home for their family and to save on having to boil water

loans.name: Huon's Group

texts.en:
Huon’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Huon makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water at home for their family and to save on fuel needed to boil water

loans.name: Yat's Group

texts.en:
Yat, 40, is a married mother of two children who are both in school, living in Kampong Cham province. She has been growing rice, cassava, and rubber plants for sale as her family’s income sources for twenty-two years and it earns her about 113,000 KHR per day.

Now Yat has not enough money to work her farm, so she decided to lead a group to take a Kiva loan via VisionFund to buy seeds and fertilizer and pay for plowing fees. She hopes her farm will provide her more yield than last year.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer and pay for plowing fees

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Sara

texts.es:
Sara, de 45 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, no tuvo muchas oportunidades laborales, fue por eso que tuvo que aprender un oficio, aprendió todo acerca de la sastrería y tiene varios años desempeñando esta labor; está acompañada y su pareja se dedica a la albañilería. Sara, se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. junto a su pareja, para realizar las actividades diarias, mientras sus hijos van a la escuela.

Sara, se dedica a trabajar todo el día en su taller de sastrería, mientras su esposo se dedica a trabajar como albañil, ambos son personas luchadoras y emprendedoras.

Sara, está solicitando el crédito para comprar botones, telas, elástico, hilos, entre otras materiales que necesita para la elaboración de prendas de vestir, de esa manera espera continuar con su taller de sastrería, para incrementar sus ingresos.

Sara, sueña con ampliar su taller de sastrería e incorporar muchas más personas a su negocio.
texts.en:
Sara, 45 years old, completed high school but did not have many work opportunities so she needed to learn a trade.  She learned all about tailoring and has done this work for several years. She has a partner and her partner works in masonry.  Sara gets up at 5:00 am with her partner to do their daily activities while her children go to school.  Sara works all day in her tailor's shop while her partner works as a mason.  They are both feisty, enterprising people.

Sara is requesting the loan to buy buttons, fabrics, elastic, thread and other materials that she needs to make clothing and by doing so hopes to continue with her tailor's shop and increase her income.  Sara dreams of expanding her tailor's shop and adding many more people to her business.

loans.use: To buy buttons, fabrics, elastic, thread and other materials that she needs to make clothing.

loans.name: Lap's Group

texts.en:
Lap’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Lap makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water at home for their family and to save fuel on having to boil water

loans.name: Eva Judith

texts.es:
Eva es una sorprendente mujer, ella a sus 53 años de edad se dedica a la producción agrícola tiene 300 palos de plátano, está increíble mujer se encarga de abonar, cercar, recoger, cargar y transportar su producción, ella es madre de dos hijos y gracias a su profesión genera los recursos para el mantenimiento de sus dos hijos y la mejora continua de su calidad de vida que ha eso es lo que siempre le apunta.

Ella busca continuidad, sostenibilidad, aumento de ventas, atraer más clientes, mejorar sus condiciones pero se le ha dificultado por dos razones una el bajo costo de venta de plátano y la segunda la falta de capital para invertir en sus cultivos.

Eva quiere lo mejor para su negocio, necesita abonos, riegos, gallinaza y pesticidas para el mantenimiento de sus cultivos, estos insumos tienen un costo muy elevado que en el momento no puede asumir, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de estos insumos, ya que como se mencionó anteriormente podrá tener las herramientas para darle un buen mantenimiento a su campo.
texts.en:
Eva is an amazing woman. At 53 years old, she makes a living in agriculture and she has 300 banana trees. This incredible woman is in charge of fertilizing, enclosing, collecting, loading, and transporting her products. She is the mother of two children, and thanks to her occupation, she earns enough income to take care of them, and the continuous improvement in the quality of their lives is what she always aims for.

Eva is searching for continuity, sustainability, and an increase in sales. She also wants to attract more customers and improve her conditions, but this has been difficult for her for two reasons: one is the low cost that bananas sell for, and the other is her lack of capital to invest in her crops.

Eva wants the best for her business, and she needs fertilizer, irrigation, poultry manure, and pesticides to maintain her crops. These supplies are too costly for Eva at the moment. For this reason, she is requesting a loan to be able to buy these supplies, since as mentioned earlier, this will give her the tools to keep her crops well-maintained.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, irrigation, poultry manure, and pesticides to maintain her crops.

loans.name: Horn's Group

texts.en:
Horn’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Horn makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water at home for their family and to save on having to boil water

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water at home for their family.

loans.name: Srey's Group

texts.en:
Srey’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Srey makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as tailor to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water at home for their family and to save on having to boil water.

loans.name: Diana Yaneth

texts.es:
Una sonrisa tímida pero agradecía es la que tiene la señora Diana quien es una madre de dos hijos una de 11 años y un pequeño de tan solo 5 meses de edad, se comenta en un principio lo de la sonrisa Agradecida ya que  por motivación personal iniciara con la venta de alimentos, en una puesto de asados impulsado por fuerza.

No hay mejor motivo que el querer superarse ese quizás sea el punto fuerte de Diana quien le pondrá todo su ánimo y entusiasmo a su negocio ya que en este se juega el futuro de su familia en el buen sentido de la palabra, ya podrá mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, tener un negocio con el cual pueda pagar la educación de sus hijos, tener una forma con la cual comprar mejores cosas para la vivienda.

Su meta es crear sucursales, tener un almacén para distribuidor sus alimentos, generar empleo y que todos estos esfuerzos se vena reflejado en la compra de una vivienda.

El préstamo será usado para comprar el resto de activos fijos que necesita iniciar su negocio, como lo son un microondas, mesas, sillas e insumos como carne, panes, cubiertos y platos desechables, papas, salsas.
texts.en:
Diana has a timid but grateful smile.  She has two children, an 11 year old and a little one who is only 5 months old.  She initially says that her grateful smile is due to that fact that, through personal motivation and drive, she will start selling food at a stand that sells roasts.

There is no greater motivation that wanting to succeed.  This is perhaps Diana’s strong point.  She will put all of her energy and enthusiasm into her business.  This is because the future of her family is truly at stake.  She will be able to improve her housing conditions and have a business in which she will be able to pay for her children’s education.  She will have a way to buy better things for her house.

Her goal is to create branches, to have a store to distribute her food, to generate employment, and that all of her efforts will be reflected in the purchase of a house.

The loan will be used to buy the rest of the fixed assets that are needed to start her business.  She will buy items like a microwave, tables, and chairs and supplies like meat, bread, cutlery, disposable plates, potatoes, and salsas.

loans.use: to buy items like a microwave, tables, and chairs and supplies like meat, bread, cutlery, disposable plates, potatoes, and salsas.

loans.name: Luis Armando

texts.es: Luis Armando, tiene la edad  de 19 años, está soltero,  vive con sus padres y hermanos, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra  de fertilizantes adecuados para el estado de desarrollo del cultivo de tomate, además realizar algunos trabajos de mejoramiento del suelo por medio de labores culturales como lo es evitar la erosión del suelo por medio del agua de lluvia que esta iniciando, además pagar mano de obra para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación, de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo de tomate, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de este cultivo. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en el cultivo. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Luis Armando is 19 years old. He is single and lives with his parents and his siblings, who are his top priority.

With his loan he aims to purchase adequate fertilizer for the developmental state of his tomato cultivation, and furthermore, do some work to improve the soil by using agricultural methods like preventing the rain-water erosion of the soil that is starting. As well, he aims to pay for labor for the application of the products and assistance in planting. This way he can be assured of doing a good job. What he aims to do is to take advantage of the good weather conditions and the soil that the zone offers for tomato cultivation, and also to put into practice his experience of several years managing this crop. He also aims to be able to purchase the best products and the best quality for his farm to have good, healthy development as well as an adequate crop, and to have significant production in the short term. 

With the income he hopes to get from the harvest, he wants to use it for the wellbeing of his family and to accomplish some family goals and continue investing more in cultivation. It is the first loan that he has received form FUDECOSUR. He had not had other prior loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: cultivate tomatoes.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is 50 years old and a resident of Mitondo in Rakai. He is married with 8 children, all attending school. He deals in the business of farming where he grows pineapples on a large scale, which he started in 2005. In addition to that he also operates a butchery in a trading centre, as another source of income.

Richard, who works 6 days in a week and 12 hours per day, wants a loan of UGX3,000,000 to buy organic fertilizers and pesticides, so that his pineapples will grow well. With the fertilizers, the yield is anticipated to go high therefore raising his income.

His future hope is to be the leading supplier of pineapples on his village and in Uganda at large. Richard’s major customers are the people from different areas and juice processing factories. However, he faces challenges of poor weather conditions and pests and diseases that attack the crops and yet he has to spend a lot of money to spray which hinders the growth of his business.
  
He describes himself as honest and hardworking man who appreciates the services provided to him by lenders.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizers to improve the yield of his pineapples, which will lead to a better income for his family

loans.name: St. Thresa Girls School

texts.en:
Greetings from Uganda! This is Noelina. She is the head teacher at St. Theresa Girls Secondary School, a girls school with 900 students in a rural area of Vila Maria in Masaka. 

St. Theresa Girls School has requested a loan to cover the cost of installing and maintaining a UV water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students. The school does not currently have access to consistent clean drinking water and therefore has to spend a considerable portion of its budget on firewood, which is used to boil water for the children. 

Installing a water filtration system will therefore save the school money in the long-term, as the cost of firewood will be reduced. The loan will enable the school to purchase two UV water treatment systems with two 750 litre tanks, which will be big enough to store clean drinking water for the students every day. 

St. Theresa Girls School will repay their loan from their school fees, which they collect each term.

Noelina ultimately hopes that having access to safe drinking water will improve her students’ concentration and attendance by reducing the number of children that fall sick from water-borne diseases, as well as increase the number of students coming to the school.

loans.use: To purchase a water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students.

loans.name: Chhean's Group

texts.en:
Chhean, who is 34 years old, is thee mother of four children, two of them in school.  The family lives in Kampong Cham province. 

The sources of her family’s income are rice farming, fishing, and working as a construction worker for sixteen years. She earns about 48,000 KHR per day to support her family. 

To fulfill her needs, she is now leading a group to apply for a loan via VisionFund to buy a cow for plowing her rice farm. She hopes her crops will grow well and gain her more yields than last year.

loans.use: to buy a cow for plowing her rice farm

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en:
Vincent is age 33 and married with three children, who all attend school in Kasese.  He owns a bar and is also involved in farming.  He has hopes of growing and expanding his business, despite the challenges of sleeping less hours and high government taxes. 

Vincent will use the loan to buy spirits, beers, wines and sodas to sell.

loans.use: to buy spirits, beers, wines and sodas to sell.

loans.name: Ivan Antonio

texts.es: Ivan Antonio, tiene la edad  de 41 años, está en unión libre,  vive con su esposa, la cual es su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de algunos artículos eléctricos para trabajar en una soda, busca que estos utensilios tengan características adecuadas para la preparación de alimentos y que le facilite las labores y que den un buen rendimiento y que sean de buena calidad, la compra de estas herramientas le facilitará mejor la elaboración de recetas. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Ivan Antonio is 41 years old. He is in a common-law marriage and lives with his wife, who is his greatest priority. With his loan, he plans to make the purchase of some electrical appliances that will work in a cafe. He is looking for items that will have sufficient quality for the preparation of food, that will make work easier, that will give a good performance, and that will be of good quality. The purchase of these tools will better facilitate the preparation of recipes.

This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He hasn't had any previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him the loan with better payment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy items for his cafe

loans.name: German Bolivar

texts.es:
El señor Germán es un  emprendedor es Padre soltero, tiene siete hijos de los cuales dos todavía dependen de él trabaja como cuidador de una finca, viene de una familia humilde de bajos recursos económicos sus padres se dedicaban a la agricultura y crianza de cerdos no tenían muchas posibilidades por lo que no pudo culminar sus estudios primarios, a muy temprana edad ayudaba a sus Padres a trabajar en la finca en las labores agrícolas.  
Don Germán  vive y trabaja en San Miguel de los Bancos el Cantón del Amor, un Cantón de clima cálido húmedo, el mismo cuenta varios sitios de descanso que son muy visitado por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, como tradición tenemos las fiestas del Cantón en  las cuales se realizan bailes populares y la famosa quema del castillo la gente en este Cantón es muy amable, tranquila y generosa con todos sus visitantes.
Solicita este crédito para fortalecer su negocio que es la crianza de cerdos al mismo le dedica un promedio de cuatro horas diarias  dos de sus siete hijos le apoyan constantemente en el cuidado de los mismos, aprendió de esta actividad cuando vivía con sus Padres en una finca, con esta inversión espera mejorar sus ingresos económicos y mejorar la calidad de vida de sus dos hijos que aún tiene a cargo y dependen de él.
Don Germán Murcia agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y la ayuda que le brindan para fortalecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Señor Germán is an industrious single father of seven children, two of whom he still supports with his work as a farm laborer. He comes from a humble family that had little wealth. Don Germán's parents were farmers who also raised pigs, but couldn't afford to pay for his studies, and he didn't finish primary school. Instead, he helped his parents do the work that their farm required, and learned to raise pigs. 

Don Germán now lives and works in San Miguel de los Bancos, in the Amor Canton. The area has a warm, humid climate that draws tourists from across the country and around the world. The canton has a long tradition of festivals with dances and fireworks displays. The people of Amor Canton are kindhearted, relaxed, and generous to tourists. 

Don Germán is applying for a loan to improve his business raising pigs, which takes up an average of four hours a day. Two of his seven children also tend to the herd every day. Don Germán hopes that the investments that this loan will make possible will improve the quality of life of the two children who still live with him and depend on him. He is grateful to the  Fundación Alternativa and to Kiva for their support and help improving his business.

loans.use: to improve his pig-raising business.

loans.name: Roem

texts.en:
Roem is 30 years old and the mother of three dependent children.  She lives in Kandal province, 

She has been growing rice as the main source of her income. Tailoring is an additional business to supplement income. 

She is now leading s group to apply for a loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). As the group leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy cow for plowing her rice farm. 

She hopes that she can earn more income to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cow to use for plowing her rice farm

loans.name: Sreang's Group

texts.en:
Sreang, 46, is a mother of four children, living in Kampong Cham province. Growing rice on 1.2 hectares farmland and working for other farm for fees are the sources of her family’s income for sixteen years and it provided her about 40,000KHR per day. 

She is leading a group to take a loan via VisionFund to buy fertilizer, pesticide and pay for plowing fees. She hopes to earn more income and improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticide and pay for plowing fees, which will improve the family standard of living

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more cloth materials to sell

loans.name: Sourn's Group

texts.en:
Sourn, who is 51 years old, lives with her family in a rural village of Kampong Thom province. She is the mother of three children. 

To overcome her family’s hardship, she grows rice and works for others for a fee. She has been involved in this business for ages and earns her about 40,000 KHR per day. 

Now she is form as group to apply for a loan with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner. As the group leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy a decent latrine for family use. She hopes that her family will have a better standard of living and be healthy.

loans.use: to buy a decent latrine

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Stoeng Sen District

loans.name: St. Francis & Our Children Schools

texts.en:
Greetings from Uganda! This is Emmanuel. He is the project caretaker of St. Francis Bbaala Primary and Our Children & Our Future Technical Schools, which are mixed schools with a total of 780 students in the rural areas of Kamukongo & Kitambi in Masaka. 

St. Francis Bbaala and Our Children Schools requested a loan to cover the cost of installing and maintaining UV water filtration systems to provide clean drinking water for the students. The schoosl do not currently have access to consistent clean drinking water and therefore has to spend a considerable portion of its budget on firewood, which is used to boil water for the children. Installing a water filtration system will save the schools money in the long term since the funds needed for firewood will be reduced. The loan will enable the schools to purchase three UV water treatment systems with two 450 liter tanks and a 750 liter tank, which will be big enough to store clean drinking water for the students every day. 

The schools will repay their loan with the school fees that they collect each term. Emmanuel ultimately hopes that having access to safe drinking water will improve his students’ concentration and attendance by reducing the number of children that fall sick from water-borne diseases, as well as increase the number of students coming to school.

loans.use: to purchase a water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students.

loans.name: Sreyleak's Group

texts.en:
Sreyleak is a 40-year-old mother of six children. Five of her children are in school, and they live in the Mondulkiri province. 

Growing cassava and working for other farms has given Sreyleak a source of income for her family for more than five years. It earns her about 81,200 KHR per day. Due to lack of funds, she is now leading a group to take a Kiva loan via VisionFund to pay for plowing fees. She wishes to gain more yields and to have the ability to renovate her old house.

loans.use: to pay for plowing fees.

loans.name: Sreoun's Group

texts.en:
Sreoun, 55, is a mother of three children who are all in school, living in Kampong Cham province. Growing cassava and working for other farm are the sources of her family’s income for more than ten years and it earn her about 21,700KHR per day. 

Due to lack of funds, she is now leading a group to take a Kiva loan via VisionFund to buy seeds, fertilizer and pay for plowing fees. She wishes to gain more yields than last year.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and pay for plowing fees to have better yields than last year.

loans.name: Heang's Group

texts.en:
Heang is a 55-year-old mother of three children, living in the Mondulkiri province. Growing cassava and renting her house to others for fee have been the sources of Heang's income for her family for more than five years. It earns her about 112,200 KHR per day. 

Due to lack of funds, Heang is now leading a group to take a Kiva loan via VisionFund to buy farming supplies for her farming. She wishes to gain more yields and to have the ability to expand her current business.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Savoeurt

texts.en: Savoeurt is 24 years old and married living in the Siem Reap province. Cassava farming, growing rice and feeding chickens have been the sources of her family’s income for four years. Due to lack of funds, Savoeurt is now applying for a loan with VisionFund in order to pay for plowing fees. She hopes to earn more money and improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for plowing fees.

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Delmis Yessenia

texts.es:
Delmis, de 31 años de edad, es madre soltera, estudio hasta bachillerato, solo vive con su única hija y su hermano.

Delmis, se dedica a la venta de útiles escolares desde hace 3 años, esta actividad la inicio con ayuda de una amiga, ya que fue ella quien le proporciono un pequeño espacio en su casa, para que colocara su negocio y con el tiempo, el negocio fue creciendo poco a poco con esfuerzo y dedicación.

El crédito lo necesita  para comprar más útiles escolares, ya que le va muy bien en el negocio, por esa razón necesita el apoyo crediticio, con el cual generará mayores ingresos para ella y su familia.

Su principal sueño, es que su hija siga estudiando, tener su negocio bien establecido y en un local propio.
texts.en:
Delmis, who is 31 years old, is a single mother. She finished secondary school. She lives with her only daughter and her brother.

Delmis has been selling school supplies for 3 years. She began this business with the help of a friend, since she was the one who provided a little space for her in her house, so that she could set up her business. With time, the business has been growing little by little with her efforts and dedication.

She needs the loan to purchase more school supplies, since things are going well for her in her business. For this reason, she needs the support of the loan, with which she will generate greater income for her and her family.

Her principal dream is that her daughter can continue going to school and that she can have a well-established business in its own location.

loans.use: to buy more school supplies.

loans.name: Maria Blanca

texts.es: María a sus 70 años de edad se dedica a la crianza de animales, María  tiene 5 hijos pero todos viven por aparte  ya que son casados. María junto a su esposo se dedican a la crianza de animales y a la agricultura, María vive en el campo y alli tiene un espacio donde criar aniamles menores. María necesita el credito para comprar chanchos y al momento de comercializarlos obtener una ganancia. Maria tiene la aspiracion de seguir con su negocio para obtener los ingresos para seguir pasando su vida y tener los recursos para cubrir las necesidades de salud, alimento estre otras.
texts.en: María at 70 years old works raising animals. María has 5 children but they all live apart as they are married. María together with her husband work raising animals and farming. María lives in the country and has room to raise small animals. María needs a loan to buy pigs and when it is time to sell them make a profit. María has the goal of continuing with her business to obtain income to continue her life and have the resources to cover the basic necessities of health, food, etc.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es:
La Señora Ruth de 40  años de edad,  tiene 3  hijos es madre soltera se dedica al negocio de venta de totilla desde hace 15 años y el cual le ayudado a salir adelante con su familia es una persona trabajadora, honesta y responsable.
Doña Ruth vive en la comunidad  de Choluteca al sur de Honduras sus clientes son las personas vecinas del barrio donde vive. 
Esta solicitando el préstamo para la compra de maíz, cal y leña para poder comprar este producto que es la materia prima para hacer las tortillas  y así darle una mejor atención a los clientes y al mismo tiempo hacer crecer su negocio .
 Su sueño es comprar su casa

Choluteca, Honduras -  Abril del 2015.
texts.en:
Ruth is 40 years old, has 3 children, and is a single mother. She has been dedicated to selling tortillas for 15 years. This work helps her go forward with her family. She is a hard-working, honest, and responsible person.

Ruth lives in the community of Choluteca in the south of Honduras. Her clients are her neighbors from the area in which she lives.

She is requesting the loan to buy corn, lime, and firewood, which are the raw materials for making tortillas. Thus, she will be able to provide better service to her clients and, at the same time, grow her business.

Her dream is to buy a house.

Choluteca, Honduras – April 2015

loans.use: to buy corn, lime, and firewood for her business.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es: Vilma, tiene 34 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene una hija con quien reside en una aldea del municipio de Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara. Vilma anteriormente generaba sus propios ingresos lavando ropa a sus vecinos, y hace 4 años decidió vender ropa de segunda mano de manera ambulante o por pedidos, vende ropa para damas, caballeros y niños. El préstamo que solicita es el sexto ciclo con ODEF y actualmente solicita 5,500 Lempiras para comprar mas ropa usada para la venta, como ser camisas, pantalones, ropa de niño, blusas y otros, para ofrecer variedad de ropa a sus clientes. Su plan es lograr tener un local para un negocio fijo y que su hija quede vendiendo de manera ambulante para mantener sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Vilma is 34 years old and is a single mother. She has a daughter, with whom she lives in a village in the municipality of Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara. 

Vilma previously generated her own income washing her neighbors’ clothes. Four years ago, she decided to sell second-hand clothing as a street vendor or by order. She sells clothing for women, men, and children.

The loan that she requests is her sixth cycle with ODEF, and at present, she requests 5,500 lempiras to buy more used clothing to sell. She will buy shirts, pants, children’s clothing, blouses, and other thing to offer a variety of clothing to her clients. 

Her plan is to succeed in securing a fixed location for her business and for her daughter to continue selling as a street vendor to maintain her income.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothing to sell, including blouses, shirts, pants, and children's clothing.

loans.name: Benjamín

texts.es:
Benjamín, de 63 años de edad, no estudio por falta de recursos económicos, pero gracias a un amigo aprendió a leer y a escribir, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, tiene tres hijos, dos de ellos ya están casados, únicamente uno está en su casa y estudia 2° año de bachillerato.

Benjamín, actualmente tiene un molino nixtamal, con lo cual recibe ingresos para suplir las necesidades de su familia, está actividad la realiza aproximadamente desde hace 4 años, su esposa y su hijo le ayudan a atender a los clientes.- Anteriormente, se dedicaba al comercio de granos básicos, pero debido a la delincuencia que existe en nuestro país y tras recibir amenazas, tuvo que renunciar a esta actividad.
  
Benjamín, necesita el crédito para comprar un nuevo motor para el molino, ya que el que tiene actualmente está deteriorado y pronto dejará de funcionar.

Su mayor sueño, es darle la oportunidad a su hijo para que siga estudiando en la universidad.
texts.en:
Benjamín is 63 years old and didn't go to school due to a lack of money, but thanks to a friend he learned how to read and write. He is married and his wife takes care of their home. They have three children, two of whom are married and one is at home and in the second year of high school. Benjamín has a grain grinding mill, from which he eceives income to support his family. He has had this business for 4 years. His wife and children help him attend to his customers. Previously, he sold basic grocery items, but due to the crime that exists in this country and receiving threats, he had to abandon that business.

Benjamín needs a loan to buy a new motor for the mill, which today is deteriorating and will soon stop functioning. His dream is to give his son the opportunity to be able to continue studying in the university.

loans.use: to buy a new motor for the mill, which today is deteriorating and will soon stop functioning.

loans.name: Dae Da Now Village Group 3

texts.en:
The fund will help 26 members of the Dae Da Now Village Group 3. Pictured above (from left to right) are Tun, Soe, Myint, Win and Hla. The Featured Borrower, Tun, has a ten acre crop farm in the Delta region of Myanmar, and like many farmers in this area, savings are low before the harvest season. 

The loan will help him purchase the necessary farming inputs, such as fertilizers and petrol for farm equipment. These inputs are vital for his crop farming to increase yield. With this loan from Proximity Designs, he no longer has to borrow from a local lender with much higher interest rates. 

Tun is 58 years old, married, and supports a family of five (three children). One of his sons is helping with his paddy farming, in order to save some money. Tun is hoping to build a secondary business of planting beans for the next season, from income generated from this loan.

The CBO leaders oversee the group of 26.  The fund will help the group purchase farming essentials before harvest time.  Dae Da Now Village’s main focus is crop farming, as well as other seasonal plantation, such as betel trees and flowers, for additional income.

loans.use: to help a large group of farmers rent farm equipment, buy fertilizers and purchase petrol for farm equipment

loans.name: Chea's Group

texts.en:
Chea, 36, is a married mother of four children and one of them is in school.  She lives in Siem Reap province. Her family’s living is dependent on rice farming and feeding pigs for eight years and it earns her about 34,900KHR per day. 

Due to lack of funds, now she is applying for a loan, with her portion to pay for plowing fees. She hopes her business will be expanded through this loan.

loans.use: to pay for plowing fees so that business can be expanded

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: 's husband in purchasing repairing tools, spare parts, tires, break shoe etc for his motorbike repairing workshop.

loans.name: Anabel Liliana

texts.es:
Anabel Liliana tiene 43 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus cuatros hijos, los cuales tienen 15, 13, 06 y 03 años de edad respectivamente, ella cuenta con buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región de Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Anabel Liliana se dedica a la venta de ropa, en la zonas de la aviación y en Oyotún, desde hace 10 años aproximadamente, además su esposo se dedica a los labores agrícolas. Ella solicita préstamo para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de mercadería para poder diversificar su stock y también desea destinar parte del préstamo en el techado de su casa, lo que va a apoyar a la seguridad de su vivienda, mejorando su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Anabel Liliana is 43 years old, and lives in her own home with her husband and 4 children ages 15, 13, 6 and 3. She has good references from her neighbors. She lives in a community dedicated to business, agriculture and livestock located in Cayalti district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.

Anabel Liliana has been selling clothing in the aviation and Oyotun zones for appromately 10 years. In addition, her husband works in agriculture.

She seeks a loan to buy a large quantity of merchandise to be able to diversify her stock and also she wishes to use part of the loan for the roof of her home. This will ensure the safety of her home, improving her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of merchandise to be able to diversify her stock.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph 49 years old, is a married man with 8 children, 6 of whom are attending school. He lives in Kasese, Uganda.  He is dealing in bicycle spare parts and he has been in that business for eight years. He practices farming, for additional income. 

Joseph has requested for a loan to buy more bicycle spare parts. Joseph dreams of expanding his business into a wholesale business, despite the hardship of high rental fees.

loans.use: to buy more bicycle spare parts to sell and be able to expand his business

loans.name: Cynthia Maribel

texts.es:
Cynthia tiene 27 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad habitada por gente amable y respetuosa que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales principalmente.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral como gallinas, patos, pavos, pollos, entre otros, se dedica a este negocio desde hace 05 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de cuyes, pavos, gallinas, entre otros animales para su negocio, esto con la finalidad de incrementar su negocio de los mismos y satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes lo que le generará ingresos mayores que van a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Cynthia is 27 years old and is in a common-law relationship, She lives in her own house in a rural part of the district of Oyotún, This community is inhabited by friendly and respectful people who work mainly in agriculture, commerce and raising animals.

Cynthia works raising and selling farm animals like chickens, ducks, turkeys and chickens amongst others. She has been in this business for 5 years and her business is located at her house. She is requesting a loan to buy a greater quantity of guinea pigs, turkeys and chickens amongst other animals for her business. Her goal is to expand her business and satisfy the needs of her clients. This will generate more income which will improve her quality of living and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of guinea pigs, turkeys and chickens amongst other animals for her business.

loans.name: Seam's Group

texts.en:
Seam, 34, is a mother of two dependent children, living in Battambang province. Growing rice is the main source of her family’s income for more than five years and she could earn about 23,500KHR per day. 

Now she is leading a group to apply for loan with VisionFund, Kiva partner. As a group leader, she will use her loan portion to buy seeds and pay for plowing fees. She hopes to earn more money and expand her current business.

loans.use: to buy seeds and pay for plowing fees and able to expand her business.

loans.name: William

texts.es:
William, de 27 años de edad, es un joven con deseos de superación, está soltero, no tiene hijos y actualmente vive con su madre, sus dos hermanos y mantiene económicamente a sus 2 sobrinos.

William, elabora vestidos para toda ocasión, es un joven que a pesar de las circunstancias de la vida, sigue muy decidió a sobresalir y a alcanzar sus metas; hace mucho tiempo atrás intento emigrar a otro país con la intención de buscar una oportunidad de trabajo mejor, pero no logró nada.- En la sastrería se involucra su madre, una de sus sobrinas y otra persona que es empleada.

William, necesita el crédito para ampliar el local en el cual trabaja, reparar el techo y comprar botones, tela y zippers para elaborar prendas y venderlas.

Su principal sueño, es ser un sastre reconocido por su buen trabajo y trabajar mucho para ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
William is 27 years old. He is a young man with the desire to be successful. He is single, doesn't have any chidren, and lives with his mother, 2 siblings, and economically supports 2 nephews.

William makes clothing for all occasions. He is a young man who, in spite of his circumstances in life, coninues to succeed and meet his goals. Some time ago he attempted to immigrate to another county with the intention of seeking better work opportunities, but he wasn't able to.

In ths tailor shop he employs his mother, one of his nieces, and another person. William needs a loan to expand the business locale in which he works, repair the roof and buy buttons, fabric and zippers to make clothing and then sell the clothing.

His dream is to be a tailor known for his good work and to work a lot in order to help his family..

loans.use: to expand the business locale in which he works, repair the roof and buy buttons, fabric and zippers to make clothing and then sell the clothing.

loans.name: Rani

texts.en:
Rani is 31 years old and lives with her husband and four children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. 

Her husband provides the service of changing seat covers of vehicles.  He purchases ready-made seat covers and stitches as well.  His shop is situated in the vehicle’s workshop market. His business is going very well because he is very expert and professional in his craft. He does not take unnecessary time with the customers and quickly changes the seat covers. 

Earlier he was providing services only for motorbike seats, and now he wants to provide services for various cars as well. For this purpose he wants to buy various colors and types of rexine so that he can show his craft for car seats also.

Rani feels proud of her husband and is living very happily. She wants to do something to help her husband financially and wants to take out a loan for him. Therefore, Rani requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband can buy various types of rexine for sewing seat covers.

Rani thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to help her husband in purchasing various types of rexine for sewing vehicle seat covers.

loans.name: Huch

texts.en: Huch, 58, is a mother of seven children who lives in Battambang province. Growing rice and cassava are the sources of her family’s income for ten years. Now she is applying for a loan with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner, to buy seeds and pay the plowing fee for the farm. She hopes to earn more money and to renovate her old house.

loans.use: to buy seeds and pay the plowing fee

loans.name: Mao

texts.en: Mao, 47, is a mother of two children who lives in Battambang province. Growing rice and corn and working on other farms for a fee have been the sources of her family’s income for ten years. Now she is applying for a loan with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner, to buy seeds and fertilizer and to pay the plowing fee for the farm. She hopes to earn more money and to renovate her old house.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer and to pay the plowing fee

loans.name: Leidy Johana

texts.es:
Leidy es joven adorable de 19 años de edad, por circunstancias del destino quedo embarazada muy joven y el padre la dejo a ella y a su hija solas, por eso desde el embarazo es una mujer que realiza el trabajo de madre y padre.
Para terminar de redondear su situación tiene una incapacidad que le imposibilita a trabajar, se salió de estudiar pro cuidar y mantener a su hija y hoy en día se desempeña como madre y vendedora de alimentos aprovechando su cocina para preparar pasa bocas y almuerzos.

El negocio de venta de alimentos en el momento ha bastado para suplir sus necesidades más básicas, pero incursionar en otro campo que es la venta de comidas rápidas para trabajar los fines de semana, solo busca tener más capital, para ella es difícil mantener a una hija, aun es joven quiere estudiar, quiere salir con sus amigas pero sabe perfectamente cuál es su responsabilidad y la asume con mucha madurez.
Solicita un prestamo para la compra de un carro de comidas rápidas
texts.en:
Leidy is an adorable young woman, who is 19 years old. Because of circumstances of fate, she became pregnant very young, and the father of the child left her and her daughter alone. As a result, since the pregnancy, she has been doing the work of both mother and father.

To add to this situation, she has a disability that makes it impossible for her to work. She stopped studying to take care of and raise her daughter. Today, she works as a mother and sells food, taking advantage of her kitchen to make snacks and lunches.

At present, her business selling food has been enough to supply her most basic needs, but she wants to start in another field—selling fast food on the weekends. She only needs more capital for this. For her, it is difficult to take care of a daughter. She is still a young person who wants to study and wants to go out with her friends, but she knows perfectly well what her responsibility is; she assumes it with a lot of maturity.

She requests a loan to buy a vehicle for fast food.

loans.use: to buy a vehicle for fast food.

loans.name: Blanca Otilia

texts.es:
Blanca es un veterana de 48 años de edad, ella muy trabajadora, comprometida, ama mucho a sus dos hijas que tienen 9 y 14 años de edad, se separó de su esposo y desde hace un tiempo es madre cabeza de familia, el padre las niñas le ayuda con el alimento y ya ella se encarga de pagar la cuenta de servicios públicos, la renta del hogar y los gastos extras que resultan en el camino.

Blanca para pagar todas las deudas tiene un negocio propio que es una venta de abarrotes ubicada en su hogar, vende productos como frijoles, arroz, panela, aceite de cocina, mantequilla, huevos, quesito, refrescos, arepas, pastas, guisantes, leche, productos que son de uso diario en los hogares. 

Su negocio nació de la necesidad económica, ante el cambio en su vida de pasar a ser una ama de casa a una empresaria con responsabilidades y obligaciones, se encuentra adaptando al cambio y ahora busca hacer de su tienda más tractiva y piensa hacerlo invirtiendo en una mayor variedad de surtido, buscando que los clientes quieran ir a su tienda ya que tendrá un amplia variedad de productos y marcas a eso le apunta.

Pensando en esta estrategia quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de surtido como lo son carnes frías como; salchichón, salchicha, jamón, también quiere invertir en víveres como latas de sardinas, de comidas preparadas como frijoles o sopas instantáneas, productos para el aseo del hogar y aseo personal.
texts.en:
Blanca is an experienced 48-year-old, very hard-working and dedicated. She greatly loves her two daughters, ages 9 and 14. She is separated from her husband and has been the head of her family for some time. The children's father helps her with food costs, and she pays the public services bill, the rent, and the other household costs.
In order to pay her costs, Blanca has her own business selling groceries from her home. She sells products like beans, rice, sugar, cooking oil, butter, eggs, cheese, drinks, arepas, pasta, peas, milk, and household products.
Her business was born out of economic necessity; she went from being a housewife to a businessperson with responsibilities and obligation. She is adapting to the change and now hopes to make her store more attractive. She plans to do this by investing in a larger quantity of stock. She hopes that clients will want to go to her store and that she will have an ample variety of products and brands.
She wants to request a loan to purchase stock of cold meat such as sausage, wieners, and ham. She also wants to purchase grocery items like canned sardines, and prepared food like beans and instant soups, as well as household and personal items.

loans.use: to buy sausage, ham, sardines, prepared foods like beans or instant soup, home products, and toiletries.

loans.name: Stella

texts.en:
Stella is farmer living in Vardaqar village of Shirak region. She lives together with her parents-in-law, husband and two children (daughter 16-years-old and son 15-years-old). Their whole family is involved in farming activities. Their farm includes three cows, calves and hens. They also own arable land near their house where wheat, barley, potatoes and peppers is cultivated. Each member of the family has his own task on the farm: women take care of land cultivation, men are responsible for harvesting and selling products in the market.
 
This loan will help Stella and her family to develop their farm. She plans to purchase potato seeds, fertilizer and forage for feeding the livestock, and improve their farm.  Because the region where Stella's village is located is considered poor, and the unemployment rate here is very high, people face numerous difficulties in developing their businesses. Stella's loan has been approved within the joint initiative between SEF and Kiva, which provides loans to the underserved population of the Shirak region to help them to access the market and earn a living.

The whole family, together with Stella, hopes to receive the loan and make their farm richer.

loans.use: to pay for potato seeds, fertilizer and forage for feeding livestock on her family-run farm

loans.name: Sopheap's Group

texts.en: Sopheap is a 60-year-old mother of six children who lives in Battambang province. For twenty years, her family’s living has been dependent on rice farming on 1.5 hectares of farmland and selling cake. Due to lack of funds, she is now leading a group to take a loan with VisionFund to buy seeds, fertilizer, and pesticide and to pay the plowing fee. She hopes to improve her family’s standard of living through this loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and pesticide and to pay the plowing fee

loans.name: Bai's Group

texts.en: Bai is 55 years old, a mother of six children, and lives in Battambang province. For twenty years, her family’s living has been dependent on rice farming on three hectares farmland and working on other farms for a fee. She can earn about 51,700 KHR per day. Due to lack of funds, she is now leading a group to take a loan with VisionFund to pay the plowing fee. She hopes to improve her family’s standard of living through this loan.

loans.use: to pay the plowing fee

loans.name: Aimée Florentine

texts.fr:
Mère de famille, 27 ans, Florentine est une femme seule car elle est divorcée. Son mari l'a quitté il y a deux ans environ. Elle assume seule les devoirs et responsabilités envers ses trois petits enfants âgés de 7, 5 et 3 ans. Les deux de ces derniers vont actuellement à l'école mais le dernier pas encore.
Elle habite avec sa mère en ce moment, cette dernière l'appui un peu pas financièrement mais en s'occupant de temps en temps de ses petits.
Elle vend des couvres lits, couettes, sacs de couchages et rideaux à l'occasion depuis 2008. Elle souhaite développer son activité, elle veut joindre chaque jour chaque grand marché des différents villes. Ce fonctionnement exige plus d'investissement mais provoque beaucoup plus des gains financiers.
Son objectif est de pouvoir offrir une meilleur éducation et une meilleur condition de vie à ses enfants. De plus, elle ne reçoit aucune aide de la part du père de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Florentine is 27 years old. She is alone because she is divorced. Her husband left her about two years ago. She assumes alone her duties and obligations for her three small children of seven, five and three. The two oldest children go to school, but the youngest not yet.
She lives with her mother at present, her mother does not help her financially, but gives a hand looking after the children from time to time.
She has been selling bedspreads, quilts, sleeping bags and curtains since 2008. She wants to expand her activity. She would like to be present daily at one of the markets in the different towns. This would imply more investment, but would provide much more financial gain. Her aim is to be able to offer her children a better education and better living conditions. In addition, she does not receive any help from the father of her children

loans.use: to buy more bedspreads, quilts and curtains.

loans.name: Aris Aurora

texts.es:
La Señora Aris de 32  años de edad,  vive con su esposo y sus  2  hijos en una comunidad de Choluteca al sur de Hondura, se dedica a su negocio que es la venta de tortillas y agua desde hace 10 años, sus clientes son los vecinos y amigos de su comunidad.
Doña Aris es persona muy responsable y trabajadora está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de maíz, leña y cal que son la materia prima para elaborar las tortillas y así obtener los ingresos necesarios para salir adelante con su familia.
 Su sueño es en un futuro poder comprarse una casa.

Choluteca, Honduras - Abril del 2015.
texts.en:
Aris is 32 years old, lives with her husband and has 2 children in the community of Choluteca in the south of Honduras. She has made a living with her business selling tortillas and water for the last 10 years. Her customers are neighbors and friends from the community.

Aris is a very responsible and hard-working person and is asking for the loan to purchase corn, firewood, and lime which are the main ingredients to make tortillas so that she can make ends meet with her family. 

Her dream is to be able to buy a house in the future. 

Choluteca, Honduras - April 2015

loans.use: to purchase corn, firewood, and lime for her business.

loans.name: Elsa Violeta

texts.es:
Elsa Violeta tiene 45 años de edad, es casada, vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos en el distrito de Nueva Arica, su población se dedica al cultivo de caña y frutales, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza de aves de corral como patos, gallinas y pavos, su negocio esta ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio, con los ingresos que recibe contribuye con los gastos familiares, cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias por parte de los pobladores de su distrito. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de alimento balanceado para tener una mejor producción en su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia, lo que aumentará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elsa Violeta is 45 years old and married. She lives with her husband and children in the district of Nueva Arica. It's inhabitants work growing sugar cane and fruit and it is located in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the North Coast of Peru.

She works raising barnyard animals like ducks, chickens and turkeys and her business is located behind her house. With the money she gets she contributes to the family's expenses. She has experience in this business and has good references from people in her district. She has requested a loan to buy balanced feed to have higher production in her business and in this way generate more income for her family which will improve their quality of living.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed to have higher production in her business.

loans.name: Samuon's Group

texts.en:
Samuon’s Group lives in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. 

Samuon makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as tailor to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses as well as save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Hilda Marina

texts.es:
Hilda, de 47 años de edad, es una persona honesta y trabajadora, que a pesar de las circunstancias de la vida, ha sabido salir adelante, no fue a la escuela, debido a los escasos recursos económicos de su familia; es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijas a las cuales ha podido darles el sustento diario.

Hilda, trabaja en la elaboración de artesanías, ella utiliza materiales naturales como tule.

Ella, necesita el dinero del préstamo para comprar material para la elaboración de petates, ya que en esta época se cosecha bastante el tule, ella pretende comprar lo suficiente para estar elaborando petates todo el año y poder comercializarlos.

Su principal sueño, es que en su hogar nunca falte lo necesario.
texts.en:
Hilda is 47 years old. She is an honest and hard-working person. Despite her life circumstances, he has gone forward. She didn’t go to school, because of the lack of financial resources in her family. She is a single mother and has 2 children, for whom she has been able to provide.

Hilda works in making handicrafts. She uses natural materials, such as the tule plant.

She needs the money from the loan to buy material to make bedmats, since in this season, a lot of tule is harvested. She hopes to buy enough to be making bedrolls the whole year and to sell them.

Her main dream is for nothing necessary to be lacking her household.

loans.use: to buy material to make bedrolls.

loans.name: Leonardo Enrique

texts.es:
Leonardo un hombre de 38 años de edad, vive en las zonas rurales de Lorica, desempeñándose como maestro de obra, una actividad con la que puede generar el sustento para su familia conformada por 5 hijos de 12, 9, 8, 8 4 años de edad, sus hijos son muy niños y dependen enteramente de su padre ya que su madre es ama de casa y los cuida.

Inicio la actividad por gusto y vocación al trabajo independiente, trabajo primero como ayudante de obra, adquirió algunos conocimientos empíricos y los completo con algunas capacitaciones.

El sueño de Leonardo es construir su propia vivienda, trabaja fuertemente para lograr este objetivo, para ello tendrá que mejorar su profesión y tiene una muy buena idea de cómo hacerlo, Leonardo no ha podido realizar unos contratos debido a la falta de herramienta para operar y prefieren dárselo a otro oficial, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo para complementar la herramienta que le falta, como lo son almádana, cubeta para revocar, palustre, taladro, maquina corta cerámica y un nivelador.

Tu préstamo será muy importante para el futuro laboral de Leonardo, con estas herramientas tendrá oportunidades de empleo, mejorando sus ingresos y  por ende la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Leonardo is a 38-year-old man. He lives in the rural zones of Lorica and works as a master builder. This allows him to generate an income for his family: he has five children ages 12, 9, 8, 8, and 4. His children are very young and depend entirely on their father; their mother is a housewife and takes care of them.
Leonardo started his business because he likes it. He works independently. He started off as a helper, obtained knowledge, and capped it off with training.
Leonardo's dream is to build his own home. He works hard to obtain this goal. To do so, he has to improve his business and he has a very good idea of how to do this. Leonardo has not been able to accept some contracts because he does not have the proper tools; the contracts were given to others. For this reason, he would like a loan to get the tools he lacks, including a sledgehammer, a bucket, a margin trowel, a drill, a ceramic-cutting machine, and a leveller. 
Your loan will be very important for Leonardo's business' future. With these tools he will have opportunities for work, which will improve his income and, as a result, the quality of life of his family.

loans.use: to buy the tools he lacks, including a sledgehammer, a bucket, a margin trowel, a drill, a ceramic-cutting machine, and a leveller.

loans.name: Auris Manuel

texts.es:
Euris es un hombre cuyo trabajo ha logrado mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, de él depende sus padres y su pequeño hijo de 7 años de edad, es un hombre soltero y que vende frutas en la calle, su idea de negocio nació pro necesidad económica, requería de alguna entrada de dinero pues no contaba con trabajo y el tiempo pasaba y en su casa era más latente la necesidad, pero gracias a su idea su familia goza de alimentación y en el momento gracias a Euris no le falta nada.

En su negocio ofrece tres empleos, tiene personas distribuidas por la zona trabajando para él e igualmente el sale todas las mañanas a tratar de vender todo su surtido.

Sus sueños es poder pagar la educación de sus hijos, mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, generar empleo y para ello debe combatir contra su principal dificultad y es la inseguridad en la zona para trabajar. 

Para cumplir sus sueños debe mejorar sus ventas, aumentar sus clientes y tener una mentalidad ganadora y nunca conformarse.

Euris quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de una carreta de frutas y surtido de mangos, fresas, guayaba, aguacate, mandarina, entre otras frutas, la carreta será para darle la oportunidad de empleo a otra persona.
texts.en:
Euris is a man whose work has improved his family's quality of life. His parents and his 7-year-old depend on him. He is single and sells fruit in the street. His business was born out of economic necessity. He needed money because he didn't have work and time was passing, and his household was in need. Thanks to his idea, his family has food and, at the moment thanks to Euris, they lack nothing.
Euris has three employees. He has distributors in the area working for him, and he also goes out every morning to try to sell his whole stock.
His dreams are to be able to pay his children's education, improve his home, and generate employment. To do this, he has to struggle against his main difficulty: the danger of the neighbourhood where he works.
To reach his dreams, he has to improve his sales, increase his clientele, have a winning mentality, and never resign himself to anything.
Euris would like to request a loan for the purchase of a cart of fruits and stock of mango, strawberry, guyava, aguacate, mandarines, and other fruits. The cart will be for the purpose of offering an employment opportunity to others.

loans.use: to buy a cart of fruit and stock of mango, strawberry, guyava, aguacate, mandarines, and other fruits.

loans.name: Luz Duvina

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer de 33 años de edad, trabajadora, responsable, comprometida, ella es madre de 4 hijos, vive en un hogar hecho de madera y paja y se dedica a la cría de cerdos, una actividad muy típica en la zona de Momil  y dicha actividad por su facilidad de ejercer ha significado una alternativa de trabajo para personas como Luz que por tener una familia y 4 hijos no puede salir a buscar trabajo solo pro criarlos.
