Mapan enables customers to save up, little by little, by depositing change at agents and as their balance grows, it allows customers to make major asset purchases like housewares, appliances, and school supplies for their children.  

As a Mapan agent, Syafrohmanuddin is responsible for processing deposits from customers into their Mapan accounts as well as receiving orders from customers who want to buy products listed in Ruma's Mapan catalog. When a customer orders, Syafrohmanuddin will submit the order via SMS and within 5-10 days, the product will be delivered to the customer. With Mapan, Syafrohmanuddin believes that his community will be able to have access to higher quality products with better prices. 

As the business grows, Syafrohmanuddin is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. Having known about the importance, your loan will be very useful to help Syafrohmanuddin improve his business and accordingly, his community who needs access to such services.  As seen in the photo, Syafrohmanuddin is the one who is sitting. He thanks you for your kind support.

loans.use: to increase the working capital deposit needed to help community members save for big purchases through Ruma's layaway product called Mapan.

loans.name: Miriam Del Socorro

texts.es:
La elaboración de manualidades es todo un arte, lleva mucho tiempo y dedicación, pero la satisfacción que da ver el producto final, borra toda fatiga y el cansancio. Así lo confiesa Miriam, que tiene varios años de dedicarse a esto, gracias al apoyo de las remesas de su hermana. 

Por lo cual, solicita un crédito para la compra de materiales como papel foami, papel satinado, pegamento, alambre, accesorios para decorar, entre otros. Que le ayudará en la elaboración de sus artículos, en consiguiente podrá ofrecer mayor variedad e incrementarán sus ventas.
texts.en:
Handicraft making is an artform which takes a lot of time and dedication but the satisfaction of seeing the final product erases all the fatigue and tiredness, as Miriam states.  She has been working on this for a few years thanks to the remittances from her sister.
She's requesting a loan to buy materials like foam and satin paper, glue, wire, decorative accessories, among other items.  This will aid in the preparation of her handicrafts and allow her to offer a greater variety of products and to increase her sales.

loans.use: to buy materials like foam and satin paper, glue, wire, decorative accessories, among other items.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy vegetables

loans.name: Sonia Yadira

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Los Andes se reúne cada quince días en un sector conocido como El Guabito de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar de gente amable,  trabajadora y dedicada  a sus familias.
En este lugar vive la señora Sonia, tiene 43 años de edad, está casada y  de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 20 años que son mellizos, uno de ellos  estudia en universidad. Su esposo es chofer.
Doña Sonia se dedica a la venta de zapatillas por catálogos de varias marcas,  actualmente y con la ayuda del crédito también está vendiendo sabanas y ropa de todo tipo, ella siempre le gusta ir viendo cómo ganar más es por eso que decidió invertir en estas mercaderías la cual le está dejando muy buenas ganancias, de la misma forma sus ventas son puerta a puerta o en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes. Lleva más 3 años en su negocio el cual le permite ganarse la vida. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar ropa, zapatos y sabanas. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque gracias al los créditos empezó su negocio. Sus sueños son que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
The "Los Andes" communal bank meets every 15 days in the area known as El Guabito of the city of Portoviejo, a place of friendly people, who are hard-working and dedicated to their families.  Sonia lives here. She is 43 years old, married and from this relationship has two 20 year old twins, one of whom is studying in university. Her husband is a driver. 
Sonia sells shoes by catalogue order from various name brands and also, with the help of the loan she has been selling blankets and clothes.  She's always looking for ways to increase her income which is why she invested in these products which are giving her a good profit.  She sells her products by going door to door or at her house where her clients come visit.  She's been carrying on with this business for 3 years which allows her to earn a living.  
She's requesting a loan to buy clothes, shoes, and blankets.  She's been in the Credit Group from the beginning and she likes it because thanks to the loans she was able to start her business.  Her dream is for her children to become professionals.

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes, and blankets.

loans.name: Yat's Group

texts.en: Yat’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Yat makes a living cultivating rice  to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Rorn's Group

texts.en: Rorn’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Rorn makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family. In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Ama

texts.fr: Afin d'acheter des produits de jardinage pour revendre, Ama demande un premier crédit à WAGES. Démarrée en 2010, cette activité l'aide à subvenir à leurs besoins et celui de ses 03 enfants. Elle souhaite améliorer son activité et le bien - être de la famille.
texts.en: In order to buy gardening products for resale, Ama requests a first Wages loan. She started this business in 2010, and it enables her to provide for herself and for her three children. She would like to improve her business and her family's well-being.

loans.use: To buy gardening products.

loans.name: Kafui

texts.fr: Kafui est une femme mariée et âgée de 31 ans qui habite à Mayakopé. Kafui est mère de quatre enfants et travaille activement pour son épanouissement. Pour trouver son revenu, Kafui vend des sceaux, des objets plastiques et de la farine de manioc dans le quartier pour gagner son bénéfice. Kafui s’approvisionne deux fois par mois et demande ce crédit pour commander des bassines, des sceaux plastiques et de la farine. Kafui souhaite augmenter sa marge bénéficiaire et permettre une bonne éducation à ses enfants.
texts.en: Kafui is a married woman of 31 who lives in Mayakopé. Kafui has four children and works hard so that they all flourish. To ensure her income, Kafui sells buckets, plastic objects, and manioc flour locally to make money. Kafui buys her supplies twice every month and requests this loan to order bowls, plastic buckets, and flour. Kafui would like to increase her profit margin and offer her children a good education.

loans.use: to buy two dozen plastic buckets, and 18 plastic bowls.

loans.name: Kombélé

texts.fr: Kombélé est une femme mariée âgée de 40 ans et mère d’un enfant. Kombélé vit à Mayakopé pour entreprendre son activité. Kombélé vend des produits d’alimentations générales dans sa boutique pour gagner sa vie et aider sa famille. Kombélé s’approvisionne cinq fois par mois au marché. Kombélé demande ce crédit pour acheter des cartons de détergents, et de pommades afin de réaliser des bénéfices pour soutenir son mari dans les charges de la famille et permettre une bonne éducation à son enfant.
texts.en: Kombélé is a married woman of 40 with one child. Kombélé lives in Mayakopé, where she started her business. Kombélé sells general groceries in her shop, to earn her living and help her family. Kombélé buys her stock five times each month at the market. Kombélé requests this loan to buy boxes of detergent, and units of cream in order to make a profit to help her husband to pay the family expenses and enable her child to have a good education.

loans.use: to buy 7 boxes of détergent et 6 units of cream.

loans.name: Rosa Holanda

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito El Palmar se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio del mismo nombre  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Rosa, tiene 48 años de edad, hace varios años su compañero de toda su vida falleció y quedo viuda, pero de esta relación tuvo 10  hijos mayores de edad, con ella viven tres hijos y dos nietos.
Doña Rosa desde hace mas de 17  años se dedica a la venta de ropa, zapatos y productos de  Avon, Yanbal y Belcorp (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta, ella sale en sus ratos libres y también vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos,  ella empezó su actividad con el primer crédito que recibió de la institución razón por lo cual está muy agradecida.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar ropa, zapatos, cremas, perfumes, entre otros. Lleva más de 17 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos empezó y mejoro su negocio y su vida. Sus sueños es seguir mejorando día a día.
texts.en:
The El Palmar credit group meets every two weeks in the neighborhood of the same name in the city of Manta. It is a city known for its beautiful beaches which are much visited all year round, as well as for being a city with unequaled beauty and a lot of tourist attractions.

This is where Rosa lives. She is 48 years old and several years ago her life's companion died and she became a widow. From that relationship she has 10 grown children. Three children and two grandchildren live with her.

For more than 17 years, Rosa has sold clothes, shoes, and Avon, Yanbal and Belcorp products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and women's accessories). She sells door to door, going out in her free time. She also sells in her house where her best known customers go. She started her activity with the first loan she received from the institution and that is why she is very grateful.

She is going to use this loan to buy clothes, shoes, creams, perfume and more, She has been in the credit group for more than 17 years old and she likes it because she started with the loans and they improved her business and her life. Her dream is to keep improving day to day.

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes, creams, perfumes, etc.

loans.name: Leida Bernardina

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito El Palmar se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio del mismo nombre  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Leida, tiene 54 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos, tres mayores de edad y la menor tiene  16 años la cual estudia en colegio, todos ellos aun viven en su casa. Su esposo es mecánico eléctrico.
Doña Leida es una mujer que le gusta trabajar para ayudarles a sus hijos en sus estudios, es así que gracias a su negocio  ella ha podido darles a sus hijos una buena educación ya los mayores son profesionales y espera lo mismo para la menor, ella se dedica al comercio,  vende de ropa de todo tipo, joyas de plata y productos Yanbal (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), su forma de ventases puerta a puerta, ella deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho o quince días. Lleva más de 16 años con este negocio el cual le permite ganar lo suyo por el bien de su familia.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, joyas, perfumes y cremas. Lleva más de 16 años en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos financia su negocio. Sus sueños son darles la mejor educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The loan group El Palmar meets fortnightly in a neighborhood with the same name in the city of Manta. This city is famous for its beautiful beaches, popular with tourists all year round, and for its many beautiful touristic attractions.

This is where Leida, 54, lives. She is married and has four children. Three of them are adults and the youngest daughter is 16 and goes to school. They all live together. Her husband is an auto electrician. Leida enjoys working to help her children with their studies. Thanks to her business, she has been able to offer them a good education. The oldest ones are professionals, and she hopes that her daughter becomes one too.

Leida is a saleswoman. She sells all kinds of clothes, silver jewelry and Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and accessories for women). She sells door-to-door, on credit, and collects the money every week or every second week. She has been in business for more than sixteen years, something that has been beneficial for her family.

She will use this loan to buy clothes, jewelry and creams. She has been a member of this group for more than sixteen years, and she enjoys being one because this is how she finances her business. Her dream is to give her children access to the best education.

loans.use: to buy clothes, jewelry and creams to sell.

loans.name: Deysi Adriana

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito El Palmar se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio del mismo nombre  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Deysi, tiene 32 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos de 14, 12, 9 y 5 años de edad, todos estudian dos en colegio y los dos menores en escuela. Su esposo trabaja en una fábrica.
Doña Deysi se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, zapatillas y sabanas, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, ella trabaja casi todos los días, aprovecha las horas de la mañana ya que a esa hora sus hijos están estudiando, en las tardes ella tiene que ayudarles en sus tareas a los más pequeños, ella tiene mucha clientela ya que les da crédito y cobra cada 8 o 15 días. Lleva más de 5 años con este negocio el cual le permite ganar sus propios recursos.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, zapatillas y sabanas ya que tiene muchos pedidos. Lleva más de 5 ciclos en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos empezó su negocio. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos y su  familia.
texts.en:
The El Palmar credit group meets every two weeks in the neighborhood with the same name in the city of Manta. It is a city known for its beautiful beaches, which are much visited all year round, and for being a city with unequaled beauty and many tourist attractions. 

This is where Deysi lives. She is 32 years old. She is married and from this relationship has four children, aged 14, 12, 9 and 5. All of them are in school, two in high school and the younger two are in primary school. Her husband works in a factory. 

Deysi sells all types of clothing, slippers and sheets. She sells door to door. She works almost every day, taking advantage of the morning hours because that is when her children are in school. In the afternoon, she has to help the youngest ones with their homework. She has a lot of customers because she sells on credit and collects every one to two weeks. She has been in this business for more than 5 years, which allows her to earn her own resources.

This loan is to buy clothes, slippers and sheets, because she has a lot of orders. She has been in the credit group for more than 5 years and she likes it because with the loans she started her business. Her dream is to give her children and her family the best.

loans.use: to buy clothes, slippers and sheets.

loans.name: Magdalena Del Rocio

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito El Palmar se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio del mismo nombre  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Magdalena, tiene 49 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos mayores de edad, dos de ellos aun viven con ellos. El marido se dedica a la pesca. 
Doña Magdalena se dedica a la venta productos Avon (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas) trabaja todos los días, ya sea en la mañana o en horas de la noche, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada 8 días. Lleva más de 4 años con este negocio el cual le ayuda mucho  para salir adelante.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar perfumes, bisutería, cosméticos y cremas. Lleva tres ciclos en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos ella mejora su negocio y su  vida. Sus sueños es mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The El Palmar credit group meets every two weeks in the neighborhood of the same name in the city of Manta. It is a city known for its beautiful beaches that are much visited all year round and for being a city with unequaled beauty with many tourist attractions.

This is where Magdalena lives. She is 49 years old and is in a common law marriage. She has three grown children and two of them still live with her. Her husband is a fisherman.
 
Magdalena sells Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume and women's accessories). She works every day be it morning or night. She sells on credit and collects every week. She has been in this business for more than 4 years and it really helps her to get ahead. 

She is going to use this loan to buy perfume, jewelry, cosmetics and creams. She has been in the credit group for more than three cycles and she likes it because with the loans she is improving her business and her life. Her dream is to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy perfume, jewelry, cosmetics and creams.

loans.name: Sofik

texts.en: Sofik is 73 years old and despite of her age she is actively engaged in farming and agriculture in her native village Ddmashen of the Gegharkunik region. She lives with her son’s family and, being skilled farmer, she does her best to support them with the profit and income from farming. On the farm she takes care of cows, a calf, a heifer, sheep and chickens. Sofik sells milk, macun (national dairy-product), curd, meat and eggs mainly to her village neighbors. As she mentioned, she only needs the help of her son in land cultivation. On her plot of land they cultivate potato, cucumber, tomato and greens. Sofik decided to borrow from Kiva in order to start land cultivation works. She needs to buy potato and cucumber seedlings, diesel fuel and also fodder for all her farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy potato and cucumber seedlings, diesel fuel and also fodder for all her farm cattle

loans.name: Lorena Monserrate

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Banco Mi Familia se reúne cada 15 días en la Ciudadela Leonidas Proaño en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Lorena, tiene 32 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 13 y 11 años de edad los mismos que estudian en colegio y escuela. El marido es obrero y trabaja en una fábrica de la ciudad.
Doña Lorena es una mujer muy trabajadora que para obtener sus propios recursos y con estos poder ayudar a su marido con los gastos familiares se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta ella trabaja dos a tres horas al día, no tiene horarios fijos, a ella le gusta su labor ya que se entretiene y así se gana algo por su cuenta. Tiene más de 4 años que se dedica a esta actividad la cual ha ido mejorando con el paso de los días y con los créditos recibidos.
Este crédito es para comprar camisas, pantalones, blusas, entre otras prendas que vende. Lleva 3 ciclos en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. Sus sueños son tener un buen local.
texts.en:
The credit group Banco Mi Familia meets every 15 days in the Citadel Leonidas Proaño in the city of Manta. The city is known for its beautiful beaches that are visited at any time of the year, and for being a city of unsurpassed beauty with many tourist attractions. 

Lorena lives in Manta. She is 32 years old and maintains a common law relationship. She has two children aged 13 and 11 who are studying in school. Her spouse is a labourer and works in a factory in the city. Lorena is a very hard-working woman who sells clothing of all kinds in order to obtain her own means and help her spouse with family expenses. She sells door-to-door, working two to three hours a day with no set hours. She likes her work because it is entertaining and she earns something on her own. She has been working at this activity for more than 4 years, and it has been improving with every passing day and with the loans received. This loan is to buy shirts, pants, blouses, and other garments to sell. Lorena has 3 cycles in the credit group and likes the aid provided by the loans. Her dream is to have a shop.

loans.use: to buy shirts, pants, blouses, and other garments

loans.name: Antonia De Lourdes

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito El Palmar se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio del mismo nombre  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Antonia, tiene 52 años de edad, está casada  y de esta relación tienen 3 hijos, dos ya mayores de edad y uno de 14 años el cual estudia en colegio y es el que aun  viven en su casa. Su marido es comerciante.
Doña Antonia realiza el crédito para que su marido lo utilice en su negocio, el se dedica a la compra y venta de pescado por libras o al por mayor, el se desplaza hasta las playas de la localidad lugar en el cual compra a muy buen precio, luego se traslada a varias empresas en las cuales entrega al por mayor y también recorre la ciudad vendiendo por libras ya que así le dejan más ganancias, trabaja todos los días en esta actividad por más de 30 años, actividad que les ha permitido salir adelante con un trabajo aunque duro muy honrando. 
Este crédito es para comprar pescado. Esta desde el inicio  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le permiten ayudar a su marido a salir adelante. Sus sueños son comprar un camión para que su marido venda sus productos.
texts.en:
The credit group "El Palmar" gathers every 15 days in the neighborhood of the same name in the city of Manta. The city is known for its beautiful beaches, which are well visited throughout the whole year, and because of the city's unmatched beauty and its many tourist attractions.

Antonia lives in this place. She is 52 years old, married and has three children from this marriage. Two are adults and one is 14 years old, goes to school and still lives at home.

Her husband is a merchant. Antonia is requesting this loan for her husband to use it in his business. He makes a living buying and selling fish by the pound and at wholesale. He goes to the city's coast, where he buys fish for a good price, and then brings them to various companies, where he resells the fish at wholesale, and also travels around the city, selling by he pound, which makes him more profit. He has worked every day for more than thirty years. This occupation allowed him to improve his financial situation, with work that is - although hard - very honorable.

This loan is to buy fish. Antonia has been in the credit group from the beginning, and she likes it because the loans allow her to help her husband to move forward. Her dream is to buy a truck for her husband to sell his products.

loans.use: buy fish.

loans.name: Arayik

texts.en: Arayik lives in the village Ddmashen of the Gegharkunik region with his wife and three children. He has had no other job apart from farming and now he is rather skilled in it. On the farm he has cows, a calf, heifers, sheep and chickens. His wife always manages to find customers for their farm products such as milk, macun (national dairy-product), curd, meat and eggs. As Arayik is the father of a big family, he has seriously considered his farm enlargement and this loan will be of great use to him. It will allow him to purchase one more cow for his farm and also fodder for his all cattle.

loans.use: for the purchase of one more cow for his farm and also fodder for his all cattle

loans.name: Lusine

texts.en: This greatly charming woman’s name is Lusine and she has already had the luck of having a Kiva and Nor Horizon partnership loan. This time she also greatly appreciates the support. She lives with her daughter in Vanadzor city of the Lori region. Her husband works abroad. She works at a school as a teacher of the English language, and she gives private courses in English to a group of pupils and prepares them for entrance examinations. As she says, she tries to make every lesson unique, interesting and greatly informative, so none of her pupils are passive during her lessons and are involved in the process of learning. So this time Lusine asks Kiva for a loan to purchase a computer and professional literature, as she has new ideas and plans for her private courses. These ideas will help her pupils to have the best results in their entrance exams.

loans.use: for the purchase of computer and professional literature, since she has new ideas and plans for her private courses

loans.name: María Belén

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito El Palmar se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio del mismo nombre  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señorita María Belén, tiene 23 años  de edad, está soltera y vive con sus padres.
Doña María Belén  se  dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo y su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, sale a recorrer casi  todos los días en sus ratos libres ya que no tiene horario fijo, ella  deja sus productos a  crédito y cobra cada ocho o quince días. Lleva más de 4  años que se dedica a esta actividad la cual le permite ganar algo por su cuenta para beneficio propio y de su familia.
Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, blusas, camisetas, ropa interior, entre otras prendas que vende. Lleva 2 años en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con el primer crédito comenzó su negocio. Sus sueños son tener un buen local algún día.
texts.en:
The credit group "El Palmar" gathers every 15 days in the neighborhood of the same name in the city of Manta. The city is known for its beautiful beaches, which are well visited throughout the whole year, and because of the city's unmatched beauty and its many tourist attractions.

Maria Belén lives in this city. She is 23 years old, single and lives with her parents.

Maria Belén is making a living as a tradeswoman, selling clothes of all kinds by going from door to door. She is selling almost every day in her spare time, because she does not have a fixed schedule yet. She sells her clothes on credit and collects the money every one or two weeks. She has been working more than four years in this profession, which allows her to earn something on her own for her own and her family's benefit.

This loan serves to buy pants, blouses, shirts, underwear, and other articles of clothing to sell. She has been in the credit group for two years and likes it because with her first loan she was able to start her business. Her dream is to have good store one day.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, shirts, underwear and other articles of clothing

loans.name: Elena Teresa

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Banco Mi Familia se reúne cada 15 días en la Ciudadela Leonidas Proaño en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Elena, tiene 42 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta  relación aun no ha podido tener hijos. El marido taxista.
Doña Elena es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, se dedica a la venta de ropa, zapatos y productos de Oriflame, Avon (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas), su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, ella trabaja tres o cuatro días a la semana y no tiene horarios fijos, lleva más de 8 años con esta actividad la cual le permite salir adelante.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, zapatos, perfumes, cremas y otros productos que ella vende. Lleva más de 4 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos. Sus sueños seguir mejorando su negocio.
texts.en:
The credit group Banco Mi Familia meets every 15 days in the Citadel Leonidas Proaño in the city of Manta. The city is known for its beautiful beaches that are visited at any time of the year, and for being a city of unsurpassed beauty with many tourist attractions. 

Elena lives in Manta. She is 42 years old and is in a common law relationship with no children. Her spouse is a taxi driver. Elena is a housewife who sells clothing, shoes, and cosmetic/beauty products (such as Oriflame and Avon). She does this to obtain her own means and to help her spouse with household expenses. She sells door-to-door. Elena works three or four days a week with no set hours. She has more than 8 years of experience with this activity, which allows her to get ahead. This loan is to buy clothing, shoes, creams, and other products for her to sell. She has more than 4 years in the credit group and likes it because the loans are fast. Her dream is to continue to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes, perfumes, creams, and other products

loans.name: Johana Carolina

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Banco Mi Familia se reúne cada 15 días en la Ciudadela Leonidas Proaño en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Johana, tiene 23 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen un hijo de 1 año de edad. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca.
Doña Johana es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos para los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, ella trabaja tres o cuatro días a la semana y aprovecha las horas de la mañana que su mamá le cuida a su bebé, ella deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Lleva más de 5 años con este negocio.
Este crédito es para comprar camisetas, pantalones, ropa interior y otras prendas. Lleva más de 4 ciclos en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos financia su negocio. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
The credit group Banco Mi Familia (My Family Bank) gathers every 2 weeks in the citadel of Leonidas Proaño in the city of Manta. The city is known for its beautiful beaches, which are well visited throughout the whole year, and because of the city's unmatched beauty and its many tourist attractions.

Johana lives in this place. She is 23 years old, married and has a 1-year old son from this marriage. Her husband is a fisherman. Johana is a housewife who sells clothes of all kinds, going from door to door, to earn her own income to pay for household expenses. She works three to four days a week and takes advantage of the morning hours, when her mother takes care of the baby. She sells her products on credit and collects the money every week. She has had this business for more than five years.

This loan serves to buy shirts, pants, underwear, and other articles of clothing. She was part of more than four loan cycles in the credit group and likes it because thanks to the loans she is able to sustain her business. Her dream is to give the best to her family.

loans.use: to buy shirts, pants, underwear, and other articles of clothing.

loans.name: Yadira Monserrate

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Banco Mi Familia se reúne cada 15 días en la Ciudadela Leonidas Proaño en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Yadira, tiene 38 años  de edad, está soltera y vive con sus padres.
Doña Yadira es una mujer que le gusta ganarse lo suyo para así salir adelante y también ayudar a sus padres con los gastos que hay en el hogar, ella  se  dedica al comercio, vende productos de Yanbal, y  Avon (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, sale a recorrer casi  todos los días en sus ratos libres ya que no tiene horario fijo, ella deja sus productos a  crédito y cobra cada ocho o quince días. Lleva más de 5  años que se dedica a esta actividad la cual le permite ganar algo por su cuenta para beneficio propio y de su familia.
Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas y cosméticos. Lleva 5 ciclos en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con el primer crédito comenzó su negocio. Sus sueños son tener un buen local algún día.
texts.en:
The Banco Mi Familia credit group meets every two weeks in the Leonidas Proaño neighborhood in the city of Manta. It is a city known for its beautiful beaches that are frequented year round, and for being a city of unparalleled beauty and many tourist attractions. 

Yadira lives here. She is 38 years old, single, and lives with her parents. She is a woman who likes to earn her own way so that she can get ahead and also help her parents with the household costs they have. She works in sales. She sells Yanbal and Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and women’s accessories). The way she sells the products is door to door. She leaves to do sales rounds almost every day during her free time, since she does not have a fixed schedule. She leaves her products on credit and charges every 1-2 weeks. She has been doing this job for more than 5 years, which allows her to earn something on her own to benefit herself and her family. 

This loan is to purchase perfumes, lotions, and cosmetics. She has been in the credit group for 5 cycles and she likes it because with the first loan she started her business. Her dream is to someday have a good store.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, lotions, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Rey De Jesús

texts.es:
Rey es un señor de cincuenta años de edad, que tiene una larga trayectoria como mecánico  y soldador de metales. El empezó su negocio como un emprendimiento apoyado por muchos financiamientos de MiCrédito y dos con Kiva. Él ha logrado salir delante de una forma admirable y está muy agradecido por el apoyo brindado. Con su ultimo préstamo logro adquirir equipos necesarios para su campo de trabajo. 
En estos momentos, que goza de un negocio con una fiel clientela y muchas oportunidades de trabajo, Rey vuelve a recurrir a la ayuda de Kiva y MiCrédito, esta vez para comprar nuevas piezas de mecánica y herramientas, como un nuevo juego de llaves. Su meta es siempre contar con la ayuda que se le ha brindado, ser responsable para que su negocio sea aún más exitoso.
texts.en: Rey is a man of fifty years of age, who has had a long career as a mechanic and metal welder. He started his business as an undertaking helped with many loans from MiCrédito and two loans from Kiva. He has managed to get ahead in an admirable way and is very grateful for the help that he has been given. His latest loan is to purchase necessary equipment for his field of work. At the moment, he is enjoying a business with loyal customers and many work opportunities. Ray is again seeking the help of Kiva and MiCrédito, this time to buy new mechanical parts and tools, such as a new set of keys. His goal is to always consider the help that he has been given, be responsible for his business, and be even more successful.

loans.use: to buy a new set of keys, tools, and mechanical parts

loans.name: Victor

texts.en:
Victor used his previous loan to buy more clothes to sell during the Christmas season. He still runs a boutique as his main source of income, a business he started because it was profitable and had ability to raise funds to support his business. He also earns extra income from being a secondary teacher. 

He hopes to increase his profits and later buy a vehicle to take him to the markets, however, the same  challenge of  inadequate capital to meet the increasing demands has continued to limit his plans. 

He is requesting a loan to buy more men'sand ladies' wear to sell.

loans.use: to buy more men's and ladies' wear to sell for him to be able to expand his plans

loans.name: Ayélé

texts.fr: Agée de 25 ans, Ayélé est une femme mariée et est mère d’un enfant. Ayélé habite dans le quartier d’Adamavo et vend des friperies en parcourant son quartier. Ayélé réalise un revenu grâce à son activité pour aider son enfant. Ayélé s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Pour commander des habits et des slips, Ayélé demande ce prêt pour atteindre ses objectifs et gagner une bonne marge bénéficiaire et promouvoir l’éducation de son enfant.
texts.en: Ayélé is a 25 year old woman, who is married with one child. Ayélé lives in the Adamavo district and sells secondhand clothing as an ambulant saleswoman in her neighbourhood. Ayélé makes an income thanks to her business, to help her child. She stocks up twice a month at the market. To order clothing and underwear, Ayélé requests this loan to achieve her objectives and earn a good profit margin to put toward her child's education.

loans.use: to buy 36 units of clothing and five dozen units of underwear.

loans.name: Junior Jacinto

texts.es:
Todos los días, junior se levanta a las cinco de la mañana para preparar los cocteles de ceviche que son tan reconocidos por las calles desde hace treinta años. Con 59 años de edad, este hombre casado cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa, quien no duda ni un segundo en ayudar en preparación de esta deliciosa comida.
Junior sueña con cambiar esa bicicleta que tanto le ha ayudado a salir adelante con su familia, por una comidería fija, debido a su edad. Sin embargo, primero quiere seguir invirtiendo en su negocio, solicitando un crédito para comprar camarones, limones, verduras, vinagre, vasos descartables, entre otros materiales indispensables para seguir creciendo personal y económicamente. En un futuro espera comprar una moto taxi para facilitar el transporte de sus deliciosos cocteles.
texts.en: Every day, Junior rises at five in the morning to prepare cebiche (shellfish) cocktails that have been renowned in the streets for thirty years. With 59 years of age, this married man has the support of his wife, who does not hesitate for a second to help in the preparation of this delicious food. Junior dreams of changing his bicycle--which has helped him and his family get ahead--for an eatery with a fixed location. But first, he wants to continue investing in his business. He is requesting a credit to purchase shrimp, lemons, vegetables, vinegar, disposable cups, and other essential materials to keep growing personally and economically. In the future he hopes to buy a motorbike to facilitate the transport of his delicious cocktails.

loans.use: to buy shrimp, lemons, vegetables, vinegar, disposable cups, and other materials

loans.name: Efa

texts.en:
Efa is a 34 year old single woman with 5 children. She makes and sells barbeque in her community to earn a living. She has 1 year of experience with this business. 

Efa needs a loan to buy mutton, sausages, chicken leg quarters and tongs. She plans to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. Efa has been a member of SPBD since 2015.

loans.use: to buy mutton, sausages, chicken leg quarters and tongs, to be able to pay for her family's expenses

loans.name: Benjamin Rafael

texts.es:
Benajamín es un joven que a su corta edad ya está casado y con muchas metas que desea cumplir muchas metas su 28 años de edad se siente muy agradecido, pues actualmente está trabajando en enfocándose en la licenciatura en Administración de Empresas, la carrera que pudo sacar gracias al préstamo anterior con el cual pudo pagar su curso de titulación y graduarse como tanto soñaba. Por esta razón es que agradece a todas las personas que lo apoyaron con ese crédito que lo hizo crecer  
Ahora este joven apasionado quiere avanzar un peldaño más en el mundo de la administración, por lo que solicita un nuevo préstamo pagar un Diplomado en Auxiliar Administrativo contable, el cual le permitirá aumentar sus conocimientos y tener mejores posibilidades en el ámbito laboral. En sus planes está ser propietario de una pequeña empresa que le ayude a las demás personas a mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Benjamin is a young man who, at his young age, is already married and with many goals that he wants to achieve. At 28 years old, he feels very grateful. Currently he is working on focusing on his degree in business administration, the major he was able to follow thanks to a previous loan with which he could pay his coursework and graduate as he had dreamed. This is why he appreciates all of the people who supported him with that loan that made him grow. 

Now this passionate young man wants to take one more step forward in the world of administration, for which he is requesting a new loan to pay for a bookkeeping diploma which will allow him to increase his knowledge and have better opportunities in the work sector.  One of his plans is being the owner of a small business that helps other people improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for a bookkeeping diploma.

loans.name: Levaai

texts.en: Levaai is a 28-year-old married woman with three children. She runs a small bakery in her community to earn a living. She has one year of experience with this business. Levaai needs a loan to buy a new stove, bags of flour, baking trays, cooking oil, new mittens, and yeast. She plans to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. Levaai has been a member of SPBD since 2015.

loans.use: to buy a new stove, bags of flour, baking trays, cooking oil, new mittens, and yeast

loans.name: Samalala

texts.en:
Samalala is a 70-year-old married woman with 5 children. She runs a small fishing business in her community to earn a living. She has 1 year of experience with this business. 

Samalala needs a loan to buy a new fishing canoe, a large cooler and a brand new chest freezer. She plans to use her profits to pay for her families weekly expenses. Samalala has been a member of SPBD since 2015.

loans.use: to buy a new fishing canoe, a large cooler and a brand new chest freezer, to cover her family expenses

loans.name: Norma Monserrate

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Dinámicas y Talentosas se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio San Pedro en la ciudad de Manta, ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Norma, tiene 56 años de edad, está casada  y de esta relación tienen 4 hijos, tres mayores de edad y uno de 16 años el cual estudia en colegio y es el que aun  vive en su casa. Su marido es comerciante.
Doña Norma es una mujer que siempre le ha gustado ganarse la vida trabajando  ella es la encargada del bar de una escuela en la ciudad, allí vende alimentos que ella prepara de la manera más saludables para que los niños tengan muy buena alimentación, ella varía el menú todos los días para no cansar a los niños, allí también ella les vende los almuerzos a los maestros que laboran en la institución con lo cual le queda más ganancias. Ya son  6 años con su negocio el cual le permite ganar sus propios ingresos.
Este crédito lo va  a emplear para comprar víveres necesarios para preparar los alimentos, así como también platos y vasos de plástico que necesita. Esta desde el inicio  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque gracias a  los créditos ella empezó su negocio. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
The Dinámicas y Talentosas communal bank group meets every two weeks in the San Pedro neighborhood of the city of Manta, a city known for its lovely beaches which are visited by many all year round, and for being a city with unequaled beauty with many tourist attractions. 

Norma lives in this place. She is 56 years old, married, and in this relationship they have 4 children, 3 adults and one who is 16 who goes to secondary school and still lives in their house. Her husband is a businessman. 

Norma is a woman who has always liked to earn her living working. She is in charge of the snack bar at a school in the city. There, she sells foods that she makes in the most healthful way so the children have very good nutrition. She varies the menu every day so the children don't get tired of ti. She also sells lunches to the teachers who work in institution, with which she gets more earnings. She has been with her business for 6 years now, which allows her to earn her own income. 

This loan will be used to purchase necessary groceries to prepare the foods, and also plastic plates and glasses that she needs. She has been in the communal bank group since the beginning and she likes it because, thanks to the loans, she began her business. Her dream is to give her family the best.

loans.use: to purchase groceries, plastic plates and glasses.

loans.name: Sovannseab's Group

texts.en:
Sovannseab is aged 45 and the mother of five children, living in Battambang province. Rice farming is the only source of her family’s income for twelve years and it earns her about 51,100KHR per day. 

Due to a lack of funds, she is now applying for a loan with VisionFund to buy fertilizer, pesticide and pay for plowing fees. She hopes to earn more money and expand her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticide and pay for plowing fees, so as to be able to expand her business

loans.name: Dipti

texts.en:
Dipti is from a small village called Boro Sholmari, of Alipurduar district in West Bengal, India.  She is a homemaker of 27 years old who looks after her husband and two children (one son and one daughter). One of her children reads in grade 4 and other is too small to go to school. 

She and her husband have been engaged in agriculture for many years. They cultivate different crops and sell the gathered harvest in the local markets. Now they are thinking of cultivating a crop which is profitable and a round the year crop. So they have decided to grow paddy on their farmland. But they have inadequate capital to invest in their business; thus they need some financial help to develop their business. 

Dipti has applied for a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner). The requested loan is very important for Dipti to be able to purchase fertilizer and seeds for paddy cultivation. The loan will greatly help this family to organize cultivation work, and they hope for a good harvest.  They hope it will be a lucrative business as the crop has a tremendous demand in the market. Dipti dreams of purchasing new land and expanding their agricultural business in the future.

She thanks her lenders.

loans.use: To purchase agricultural supplies for growing paddies (unhulled rice).

loans.name: Agalelei

texts.en: Agalelei is 22 years old with no children. She runs a small business of selling tuna sandwiches and toast sandwiches in her community to earn a living. Agalelei requested a loan to buy bread, tomato sauce, box of canned tuna, plastic bags, containers, and butter to assist with the business. She will expand her business using her profit. She joined SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy bread, tomato sauce, box of canned tuna, plastic bags, containers, and butter

loans.name: Malama

texts.en: Malama is a Samoan citizen. She is 43 years old with five children. She runs a business of selling taro and bananas at the market to earn a living. Malama requested a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, chemicals, taro root seedling, banana root seedlings, and a backpack sprayer to assist her run the business. She will use her profit to expand her business and support her family. She joined SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, chemicals, taro root seedlings, banana root seedlings, and a backpack sprayer,

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es:
El taller de Enderezado y pintura de Pedro ha ido escalando la montaña de este mundo competitivo con pasos firmes. Esto con todo el esfuerzo que da este hombre de 46 años, más un préstamo que solicitó anteriormente, con el cual pudo comprar pintura y lijas para proporcionar un trabajo de calidad. Las grandes ganancias le permitieron ahorrar para comprar un lugar favorable y así empezar su sueño de tener su propio hogar, razón suficiente por la cual agradece a todos los que le han ayudado en el préstamo anterior. 
Pedro se siente muy motivado porque ahora que tiene este terreno, no está lejos de tener su propia casa. Sin embargo, esto lo planea hacer poco a poco, por lo que desea iniciar con el servicio higiénico, de manera que solicita un préstamo para comprar un inodoro, cemento, lavamanos, ducha, tubos, arena, lava manos, entre otros materiales para construir su baño. Esto le permitirá a él y a su familia gozar de una mejor higiene y salud. En sus planes está terminar de construir su propio hogar.
texts.en:
Pedro's body shop has scaled the mountain in this competitive world with firm steps. This is with all the effort that this 46-year-old man puts into it, plus the loan he requested before, with which he could purchase paint and sandpaper to provide quality work. The large earnings allowed him to save up to purchase a good place and in this way begin his dream of having his own home, sufficient reason for which he is thankful to all those who have helped him with his previous loan. 

Pedro is very motivated because now that he has this land, it won't be long until he has his own house. However, this he plans to do little by little, so he wants to start with the bathroom, so he asks for a loan to purchase a toilet, cement, sink, shower, pipes, sand, and other materials to construct his bathroom. This will allow him and his family to have better hygiene and health. In his plans are finishing the construction of his own home.

loans.use: to purchase a toilet, cement, sink, shower, pipes, sand, and other materials.

loans.name: Silia

texts.en: Silia is 30 years old with six children. She runs a business of selling fish in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. Silia joined SPBD in 2015 and requested a loan to buy a fishing boat, fishing gear, a torch, containers, and ice bags to help her run the business. She will use her profit to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy a fishing boat, fishing gear, a torch, a container, and ice bags

loans.name: San Lorenzo  (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
En  el sitio Mapasingue de  la parroquia Colon  en la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúnen  cada quince días las socias  del Grupo De Crédito San Lorenzo. Las mismas que se dedican a diversas actividades tales como la agricultura o al comercio en general. Ellas decidieron unirse para poder acceder a los beneficios que presta la institución y con los créditos mejorar  sus negocios.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la señorita Karen, tiene 20 años de edad, está soltera y vive en casa de los padres, ella estudia  en una universidad de la localidad. Para ella este es su primer ciclo  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y espera seguir por mucho tiempo para mejorar su negocio.
Doña Karen es una mujer que para obtener sus propios recursos para poder solventar los gastos de sus estudios se dedica a la venta de ropa y productos de Avon (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y  también vende sus productos a la universidad donde estudia. Trabaja todos los días ya sea vendiendo o cobrando ya que deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Lo que más vende son los perfumes, lleva más de seis meses  que se dedica a las ventas.
Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y ropa de todo tipo. Sus sueños son terminar sus estudios y forjarse un mejor porvenir.
Las dos fotos pequeñas son de dos socias y un socio que no pudieron estar presentes cuando se tomo la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
In Mapasingue, in Colon parish, in the city of Portoviejo, the members of the San Lorenzo communal bank group meet every two weeks.  They work at a variety of businesses such as agriculture or general commerce. They decided to join together to be able to access the benefits that the institution offers and, with the loans, improve their businesses. 

One of the members of the group is Karen. She is 20 years old, single, and lives in her parents' house. She attends the university in the area. For her, this is her first loan cycle in the communal bank group and she likes it because the loans are fast and she hopes to continue for a long time to improve her business. 

Karen is a woman who, to get her own resources to be able to cover her school costs, works selling clothing and Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, ladies' accessories). She sells from door to door and also sells her products at the university where she studies. She works every day either selling or collecting for the products she has left on credit and she collects each week. She sells the most of the perfumes. She has been working in these sales for more than six months. 

This loan is to purchase perfumes, creams, cosmetics and all sorts of clothing. Her dreams are to finish her studies and to forge a better future for herself. 

The two small photos are of two female members and one male member who couldn't be present when the group photo was taken.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, creams, cosmetics and clothing.

loans.name: Lielemoli

texts.en: Lielemoli is a 27-year-old mother with three children. She owns and operates a business of selling pancakes and pork cakes in her community to earn a living. Lielemoli requested a loan to buy a sack of flour, sack of sugar, yeast, plastic bags, wooden spoon, and fry pan to assist her run the business. She hopes to use her profit to build a bakery store in the near future. She joined SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, sack of sugar, yeast, plastic bags, wooden spoon, and fry pan

loans.name: Maya

texts.en:
Maya is 26 years old and lives in a rural village of Alipurduar district of West Bengal, India.  Maya lives there with her husband and two children (one son and one daughter) in a small hut. Her children go to school and are in grade 7 and grade 4 respectively.

Maya belongs to those few rural but fortunate women who got the opportunity to study till grade 7. She is a homemaker who is responsible for managing household activities and looking after her children. The main source of income for Maya's family is vegetable cultivation, which her husband has been running for years. He grows vegetables such as beans, gourds, potatoes; chilies etc. on his farmland and sells them at the local market. Presently, the family earnings from this business are low, making it very hard for them to manage their family and think of the future. So to diversify their business for future development, they have decided to cultivate maize, which is a profitable crop, on a larger scale. So they need some financial help.

To help her husband's smooth agricultural business, Maya has decided to take a loan from Kiva’s partner, BJS, to purchase necessary farm inputs such as seeds, fertilizer, and pesticides for cultivation of maize. She hopes this will help her to increase her income and to manage her family better than her present status. Maya hopes to give a better education to her children.  She is thankful towards her lenders.

loans.use: To purchase farm inputs for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Mamina

texts.en:
Mamina is a 39-year-old humble and hardworking woman from Falakata, India. Her family is comprised of her husband and two children (one son and one daughter). Both of them are studying in grades 7 and 10 respectively. They live in their small kachha house (made of mud, straw and bamboo).  Both of the parents are illiterate and can sign their names only.  

Mamina's husband is a cycle van puller by occupation and his income is inconsistent.  So to provide a better living, Mamina has been engaged in cattle breeding for the last few years. She supplies milk to her neighbors and earns income for her family. Now this business gives a strong financial support to the family.  As the prices of essential goods are increasing by leaps and bounds, she has to work hard so that she can be able to generate more income.  She has decided to purchase one more cow and expand her business by selling milk and cattle by-products which are essential in rural areas for fuel.

For this reason she is seeking a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to purchase a dairy cow. She hopes it will help her in supplying more milk to fulfill her customers' demand and provide a better education for her children. She dreams of building a cowshed in future.

Mamina thanks her lenders.

loans.use: To purchase a cow for her existing dairy business.

loans.name: Sergio Rodolfo

texts.es:
Sergio se ha convertido en un padre ejemplar, quien a sus 35 años de edad no se rinde por obtener su título como Licenciado en Contaduría pública y finanzas. Por lo que despierta todos los domingos, entusiasmado porque es un paso más para acercarse en cumplir con ese sueño. Este padre de dos hijos de 10 y cinco años de edad, y esposo, trabaja fuertemente a diario para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
La sonrisa ilumina la sala donde cuenta que sus planes son comprar una casa propia para salir adelante con su familia y obtener un mejor trabajo. Por esta razón, es que quiere mejorar su educación, por lo que solicita un préstamo para pagar su curso de titulación y así poder desarrollarse profesionalmente como tanto lo desea. Ayuda a que este padre trabajador siga cumpliendo sus sueños de convertirse en un gran profesional.
texts.en:
Sergio has become a model father who, at 35 years old, does not give up to get his degree in public accounting and finance. 

For this, he gets up every Sunday enthusiastically because it is one step closer to meeting this dream. This father of two children, ages 10 and 5, and husband, works hard daily to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

His smile illuminates the room when he tells that his plans are to purchase his own house to get ahead with his family and to get a better job. For this reason, he wants to improve his education, so he asks for a loan to pay the fees to register his degree and, so, be able to develop himself professionally as he wants so badly. Help this hard-working father continue realizing his dreams of becoming a great professional.

loans.use: to pay the final fees to register his degree.

loans.name: Flor Angel

texts.es:
A sus 21 años de edad, Flor trabaja de lunes a sábado y estudia los domingos para salir adelante, ayudar a sus padres y convertirse en licenciada en Mercadotecnia. Actualmente se siente realizada en su trabajo, ya que va poniendo en práctica todo lo que va aprendiendo en la universidad. Afortunadamente esta joven sonriente cuenta con el apoyo de sus padres, quienes siempre la han ayudado a salir adelante. 
Flor está a punto de finalizar su licenciatura, sin embargo necesita un paso más para concluirla. Por esta razón, es que solicita un préstamo para pagar su curso de titulación y así poder obtener su título como Licenciada en Mercadotecnia. Con esto podrá apostar a un mejor puesto en el trabajo y así ir escalando profesionalmente. En sus metas está seguir ahorrando para que en un futuro pueda comprar su propio carro.
texts.en:
At 21 years old, Flor works from Monday to Saturday and studies on Sundays to get ahead, to help her parents and get a degree in marketing. Currently she feels accomplished in her work, since she is putting into practice everything that she is learning in the university.

Fortunately, this smiling woman has the support of her parents who have always helped her to get ahead.

Flor is about to finish her degree, however she needs one more step to complete it. For this reason, she asks for a loan to pay the final fees to register her degree and in this way be able to get her degree in marketing. With this, she will be able to apply for a better job position and, so, climb the professional ladder. In her goals are to continue saving up so that in the future she can purchase her own car.

loans.use: to pay the final fees to register her degree.

loans.name: Mahamaya

texts.en:
49-year-old Mahamaya is a rural housewife from Falakata in Alipurduar district, India.  Her family is comprised of three other members: her husband and two sons. She and her husband received elementary education. One of her sons is pursuing his Bachelor's degree and the other works in a small company. 

Mahamaya’s husband Sujan is a farmer, cultivating different crops with the help of Mahamaya in their small piece of land. He grows different vegetables in different seasons and sells them at the market. Mahamaya is a very active lady who wants some extra income from their agricultural business.  To improve their living conditions and to earn some extra income, they want to start maize cultivation. So she needs financial assistance.

Thus Mahamaya is seeking a loan from Kiva's field partner BJS. From the loan, she will purchase good-quality seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation. Mahamaya is very enthusiastic and determined to make her family’s future secure through hard work. She hopes the loan will help her to raise their standard of living. 

She is thankful to the generous lenders (BJS and Kiva) who stand for her cause.

loans.use: To purchase agricultural supplies for starting maize cultivation.

loans.name: Sauleone

texts.en:
Sauleone is a 24 year old woman with 4 children who runs a business to sell pancakes. She has been doing this for  a year. Sauleone  requests a loan to buy flour,  sugar, yeast, plastic bags, a wooden spoon, and a frying pan. 

She hopes to use her profit to build a bakery in the near future. 

She joined SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, yeast, plastic bags, a wooden spoon, and a frying pan.

loans.name: Ane

texts.en:
Ane is a 20-year-old and single woman who has run a business to sell taro at the market for a year. Ane requests a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, taro roots(seedling), backpack sprayer, and chemicals to help her run the business. 

She joined SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, taro roots(seedling), a backpack sprayer, and chemicals.

loans.name: Iuliana

texts.en:
A loan of $1000 ST will help Iuliana to buy taro roots(seedling), chemicals, a wheelbarrow, a backpack sprayer, and banana roots(seedling). 

Iuliana runs a business to sell taro and bananas at the market. She will use her profit to support her family and expand her business. 

She joined SPBD in 2015. She is 50 years old and has 6 children.

loans.use: to buy taro roots(seedling), chemicals, a wheelbarrow, backpack sprayer, and banana roots(seedling).

loans.name: Penina

texts.en:
Penina is a  23-year-old woman with 2 children  who operates a small business to sells pancakes, buns, and pork cakes in her community.

Penina requests a loan to buy flour, sugar, yeast, a frying pan, a wooden spoon, a bottle of vegetable oil, and plastic bags. 

She hopes to use her profit to expand her business and provide for her children's education. 

She became a member of SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, yeast, a frying pan, a wooden spoon, a bottle of vegetable oil, and plastic bags.

loans.name: Roberth Javier

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Dinámicas y Talentosas se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio San Pedro en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive don Robert, tiene 45 años de edad, está casado y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 24  y 19  años de edad, todos estudia en universidad. Su esposa trabaja en una empresa local. 
El señor Robert es un hombre que ha trabajado toda la vida con la finalidad de darles un buen porvenir  a sus hijos y a su familia, desde hace mas de 25 años atrás se  dedica al comercio, el vende pescado, todos los días se desplaza hasta Playita Mía lugar en el cual muchos comerciantes como él se dedican a la venta de mariscos, allí el instala una mesa en la cual vende sus pescados a muchas personas que a diario pasan por el lugar comprando los mariscos para luego llevarlos a sus mesas, aunque es un trabajo duro ya que tiene que madrugar todos los días lo hace por el bien de su familia.
Este crédito es para comprar pescado. Lleva 2 años  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho para financiarse. Sus sueños son tener un gran local para vender sus productos con más comodidad.
texts.en:
The Dinámicas y Talentosas communal bank group meets every two weeks in the San Pedro neighborhood of Manta, a city known for its lovely beaches that are visited by many all year round and for being a city of unequaled beauty with many tourist attractions.

Robert lives in this place. He is 45 years old, married, and in this relationship has two children, ages 24 and 19, both of whom are university students. His wife works in a local business.

Robert is a man who has worked his whole life in order to give his children and his family a good future. For over 25 years, he has worked in business; he sells fish. Every day he goes to Playita Mía, a place where many salesmen like him work selling seafood. There, he sets up a table where he sells his fish to many people who come by daily to this place, purchasing the seafood to later bring it to their tables. Although it is hard work since he has to get up very early every day, he does it for the good of his family. 

This loan is to purchase fish. He has been in the communal bank group for 2 years and he likes it because the loans help a lot to finance himself. His dreams are to have a large retail space to sell his products more comfortably.

loans.use: to purchase fish.

loans.name: Malia

texts.en:
A loan of $1000ST will help Malia to buy flour, sugar, vegetable oil, yeast, plastic bags, and containers to help her run the business. Malia owns a business to sell pancakes in her community. 

She is 42 years old and has 4 children. She will use her profit to expand her busines. 

She joined SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy  flour, sugar, vegetable oil, yeast, plastic bags, and containers.

loans.name: Tutasi

texts.en:
Tutasi is a 34-year-old mother with five children and has a small business of selling vegetables (cabbages, eggplants and cucumbers) in her community to earn a living. 

Tutasi requested a loan to buy vegetable seeds, chemicals, wheelbarrow, water tank, rake, shovel, hand gloves and safety boots to assist her in running the business. 

She hopes to expand her business by using her profit. She became a member of SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, chemicals, a wheelbarrow, a water tank, a rake, a shovel, hand gloves and safety boots

loans.name: Laloifi

texts.en:
Laloifi is 35 years old with no children; she owns and operates a small business selling pancakes, pork cakes and buns in her community to earn a living. 

Laloifi requested a loan to buy a sack of flour, sack of sugar, yeast, plastic bags, wooden spoon, and a fry pan to assist her in running the business. 

She hopes to use her profit to expand her business. She  joined SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, sack of sugar, yeast, plastic bags, wooden spoon and a fry pan

loans.name: Muimuivale

texts.en:
Muimuivale is 56 years old with seven children. She operates a business of selling banana and taro in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. 

Muimuivale requested a loan to buy banana tubes (seedlings), taro roots (seedlings), wheelbarrow, water tank, hand gloves, rake, shovel and chemicals to assist her in running the business. 

She joined SPBD in 2015 and hopes to use her business profit to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy banana tubes (seedlings), taro roots (seedlings), wheelbarrow, water tank, hand gloves, rake, shovel and chemicals

loans.name: Asosa

texts.en:
Asosa is a 52-year-old mother with one child and has a business selling vegetables (cabbages, eggplants, cucumbers) in her community to earn a living. 

Asosa requested a loan to buy vegetable seeds, chemicals, wheelbarrow, water tank, rake and hand gloves to assist her in running the business. 

She hopes to expand her business by using her profit in the near future. She joined SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, chemicals, wheelbarrow, water tank, rake, and hand gloves

loans.name: Menna

texts.en:
Menna is a 27-year-old mother with three children. She runs a small business selling tuna sandwiches and toast sandwiches in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than two  years. 

Menna requested a loan to buy bread, tomato sauce, a box of fish canned (tuna), plastic bags, a container and butter to assist with the business. 

She will expand her business using her profit. She became a member of SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy bread, tomato sauce, a box of fish canned (tuna), plastic bags, containers and butter

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado  “Mujeres Emprendedoras” está en su ciclo número 2 del programa de comités, todas quieren mejorar sus condiciones de vida, para poder dar a sus familias todo lo que ellas no pudieron tener.
La Sra. Lorena es una de las que integra este grupo, ella se dedica a la venta de comidas rápidas, y también de sopas que hace desde muy temprano y que después sale a vender, es muy buena en lo que hace, y es por ello que le va muy bien.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar verduras, carne, pollo, jamón, queso y otros, de manera a poder seguir haciendo sus comidas como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The group called  “Mujeres Emprendedoras” is in its 2nd loan cycle in the committee program; they all want to improve their living conditions to be able to give their families everything that they couldn't have.

Lorena is one of the members of this group. She works selling fast food and also soups which she makes from very early and then goes out to sell. She is very good at what she does, and for this it is going very well for her.

She asks for this loan to be able to purchase vegetables, meat, chicken, ham, cheese and more, in such a way to be able to continue making her food as she has been doing. She is grateful for this opportunity that she is getting to be able to continue growing.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, meat, chicken, ham, cheese and other supplies to make food.

loans.name: Catalina Isabel

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Dinámicas y Talentosas se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio San Pedro en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Catalina, tiene 28 años de edad, hace varios años su compañero de toda su vida falleció y quedo viuda, pero de esta relación tuvo dos  hijos de 7 y 4 años de edad los mismos que estudian en una escuela de la localidad. Vive en casa de los padres. Ella también estudia Administración de Empresas en una universidad local.
Doña Catalina con la intención de ganarse algo por su cuenta y con esto poder sacar adelante a sus hijos y para sus estudios  desde hace cinco años se dedica a la venta de ropa, zapatos y productos de  Avon, Yanbal y Belcorp (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta, ella sale en sus ratos libres y vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos,  también les vende a sus compañeras de universidad las mismas que son sus mejores clientes, ella les deja a crédito y cobra cada 8 días, gracias a este negocio ella puede salir adelante junto a sus pequeños.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar ropa, zapatos, cremas, perfumes, entre otros. Esta desde el inicio en el  Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos se ayudan para salir adelante. Sus sueños se darles lo mejor a sus hijos y ser una profesional.
texts.en:
The Dinámicas y Talentosas communal bank group meets every two weeks in the San Pedro neighborhood of Manta, a city known for its lovely beaches that are visited by many all year round and for being a city of unequaled beauty with many tourist attractions.

Catalina lives in this place. She is 28 years old, some years ago her life-long partner died and she was left a widow, but from this relationship she had two children who are 7 and 4 years old and to go a school in the area. She lives in her parents' house. She also studies business administration at a local university.

Catalina, with the intention of earning something of her own and, with this, be able to get her children ahead and for her schooling, for the past five years has worked selling clothing, shoes, and Avon, Yanbal and Belcorp products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume, and ladies' accessories). She sells door-to-door and goes out in her free time and sells in her house where her most known customers come.  She also sells to her classmates at the university; they are her best customers. She leaves the items on credit and collects every week. Thanks to this business, she can get ahead along with her little ones. 

This loan will be used to purchase clothing, shoes, creams, perfumes, and more. She has been in the communal bank group since the beginning and she likes it because, with the loans, they help each other get ahead. Her dreams are to give her children the best and be a professional.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, shoes, creams, perfumes, etc.

loans.name: Gloria Amarilis

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Dinámicas y Talentosas se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio San Pedro en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Gloria, tiene 59 años de edad, hace varios años su compañero de toda su vida falleció y quedo viuda, pero de esta relación tuvo 8  hijos mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun vive con ella. 
Doña Gloria con la finalidad de contar con sus propios ingresos y así salir adelante con  los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta productos Avon (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas) trabaja todos los días más que todo en las horas de la mañana ya que a esas horas le resulta más fácil realizar sus recorridos, ella empezó su negocio con uno de los créditos que recibió de la institución por lo cual está muy agradecida con la fundación. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar ropa, perfumes, bisutería, cosméticos, cremas y otros productos que vende. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito  y le gusta porque con los créditos ella empezó su negocio que le permite ganarse la vida. Sus sueños es tener buena salud y seguir adelante.
texts.en:
The Dinámicas y Talentosas communal bank group meets every two weeks in the San Pedro neighborhood of Manta, a city known for its lovely beaches that are visited by many all year round and for being a city of unequaled beauty with many tourist attractions.

Gloria lives in this place. She is 59 years old and some years ago her life-long partner died and she was left a widow, but from this relationship she had 8 children who are adults; one of them still lives with her.

Gloria, with the goal of having her own income and, so, to get ahead with the household expenses, works selling Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and ladies' accessories). She works every day, especially in the morning since these are the hours that it is easier to make her rounds. She began her loan with one of the loans that she got from the institution, so she is very grateful to the foundation.

This loan will be used to purchase clothing, perfume, costume jewelry, cosmetics, creams and other products that she sells. She has been in the communal bank group since the beginning and she likes it because, with the loans, she began her business which allows her to earn a living. Her dreams are to have good health and to get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, perfume, costume jewelry, cosmetics, creams, etc.

loans.name: It

texts.en:
It, 33, is a mother of two children, living in Battambang province. Rice farming and working for other farm for fee are the sources of her family’s income for eight years and she could earn about 35,500KHR per day. 

Due to a lack of funds, she is now applying for a loan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, in order to buy seeds and pay for plowing fee. She hopes to earn more money and ability to renovate her old house.

loans.use: to buy seeds and pay for plowing fees to use funds so she can renovate her old house

loans.name: Por Un Bien Comun Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado  “Por un bien común” es un grupo muy unido, donde está integrado por 22 mujeres, todas ellas amigas y vecinas de esa ciudad, quieren progresar por medio de la lucha.
Anatalia es una persona muy trabajadora, que se dedica a la venta de leche, comenta que su trabajo lo empieza todos los días desde muy temprano, que es cuando acerca a sus clientes la leche de la mejor calidad. Ella quiere seguir con su trabajo para poder continuar ayudando a su familia con los ingresos que tiene.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de leche en cantidad, de manera a poder mejorar cada día con su venta, y con los ingresos que tiene, poder seguir ayudando a sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
The group called “Por un bien común” is a very close-knit group where 22 women are members; they are all friends and neighbors in this city. They want to progress through the struggle.

Anatalia is a very hard-working person who works selling milk. She says that her work begins very early every day; that is when she she brings the best quality milk to her customers. She wants to continue with her work to be able to continue helping her family with the income that she has.
